description: To provide that a civil action may be brought against a gun owner whose firearm is used in the commission of a misdemeanor or felony and that a prevailing plaintiff in such action shall be entitled to damages, costs and attorney's fees.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Concerning Participation By Municipalities And Quasi-public Agencies In The Paid Family And Medical Leave Insurance Program.
description: To include municipal employers and quasi-public agencies in the Paid Family and Medical Leave Insurance Program.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Labor and Public Employees

title: An Act Defining An Extreme Heat Wave And Requiring The Department Of Public Health To Name And Notify The Public Regarding An Extreme Heat Wave.

description: To increase the time period for a towing company to sell a towed motor vehicle from fifteen days to sixty days.

title: An Act Providing Funding For Bus Public Transportation For Students.
description: To provide free bus public transportation to students in kindergarten to grade twelve.

description: To require that providers of short-term installment loans that charge no interest if paid off within a defined period be licensed.

description: To classify certain data brokers as credit rating agencies.

description: To provide that a mortgagee shall, upon the request of a mortgagor, provide the mortgagor with a periodic statement.

description: To require superintendents, assistant superintendents and presidents of local and regional boards of education of a school district in which eighty per cent or more of the student population belongs to one ethnic group to complete not less than thirty credit hours in cultural education in the history and socioeconomic conditions of such ethnic group.

description: To establish a personal income tax credit for expenses incurred by educators for the purpose of purchasing teaching supplies.

title: An Act Concerning A Freedom To Read.

title: An Act Concerning Cooperative Arrangements Among Boards Of Education.

last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Education

title: An Act Concerning The Calculation Of The State Standard Space Specifications For Older School Facilities.
description: To revise the state standard space specifications under the school building project grants program.

title: An Act Concerning The Inclusion Of The Naturalization Test As Part Of The High School Graduation Requirements.
description: To promote civics education and encourage participation in the democratic process among high school students.

description: To include a special education department member on the school security and safety committee and to require the accommodation of special needs in the design and implementation of crisis response drills and fire drills.

description: To prohibit biological males from participating in girls' sports and accessing girls' locker rooms and bathrooms.

description: To establish a pilot program to implement a later school start time for schools in the Technical Education and Career System.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Education

description: To exempt boards of education from paid sick leave requirements.

description: To assign a state-assigned student identifier number to each child born in Connecticut to enable data analyses of a child's developmental growth over time and to assist children who may have developmental delays but are ineligible for services.

description: To promote diversity, inclusion and cultural awareness by integrating African-American and Black and Puerto Rican and Latino studies into the educational experience of middle school students across Connecticut.

description: To warn residents, including those who fish and swim, of sewage spills occurring along rivers and streams.

description: To provide for the use of nitrogen-reducing septic systems in the state.

description: To prevent fraud in the bottle redemption program.

description: To establish an impoundment fee for the owner of animals impounded during a criminal investigation.

description: To change the method of funding community access operations in the state.

description: To (1) require each gas utility company to establish a pilot program for the development of thermal energy networks, and (2) establish a grant program to provide funding for the development of thermal energy networks.

title: An Act Removing The Combined Public Benefit Charge, Limiting Rates Allowed Under Certain Power Purchase Agreements, Amending The Definition Of Class I Renewable Energy Sources, Separating The Public Utilities Regulatory Authority From The Department Of Energy And Environmental Protection, Eliminating Certain Electricity Incentive Programs And Requiring A Study Of Methods To Increase The Supply Of Natural Gas.
description: To (1) remove the "Combined Public Benefits Charge" from consumer electric bills, (2) prohibit the Commissioner of Energy and Environmental Protection or electric distribution companies from entering into a power purchase agreement if the price for electricity under such agreement exceeds one hundred fifty per cent above the wholesale price of electricity, (3) redefine "Class I renewable energy source" to include electricity generated from any hydropower or nuclear power generating facility, (4) separate the Public Utilities Regulatory Authority from the Department of Energy and Environmental Protection, (5) eliminate any incentive program that increases electric demand, including, but not limited to, any electric vehicle rebate program, and (6) study methods by which the supply of natural gas may be increased in the state.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Energy and Technology

last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Energy and Technology

description: To increase to more than seventy-five thousand dollars the sales price threshold for a motor vehicle subject to the seven and three-fourths per cent sales and use taxes rate.

description: To require the Commissioner of Consumer Protection to (1) survey other states' occupational and professional training and licensing requirements and compare such other states' requirements to Connecticut's requirements, and (2) submit a report outlining the commissioner's findings.

description: To require the Secretary of the Office of Policy and Management to report on the status of implementation of the CREATES project report recommendations concerning digitization of agency programs and to report annually concerning overtime worked within agencies.

last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Higher Education and Employment Advancement

description: To require tuition waivers at public institutions of higher education for all veterans, regardless of whether a veteran experienced combat during such veteran's service.

last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Higher Education and Employment Advancement

description: To better serve persons who are deaf, deafblind or hard of hearing and ensure they are receiving quality interpreting services responsive to their needs.

description: To improve services for Hispanic persons and communities of color.

description: To prohibit any health insurer from using artificial intelligence as the primary method to deny health insurance claims.

description: To provide dental providers with greater flexibility to negotiate reimbursement rates with health carriers.

description: To provide that no individual or group health insurance policy that is delivered, issued for delivery, renewed, amended or continued in this state that provides coverage for paxlovid shall impose any coinsurance, copayment, deductible or other out-of-pocket expense for paxlovid that exceeds a defined amount.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Insurance and Real Estate

title: An Act Prohibiting Health Insurers From Using Artificial Intelligence To Deny Health Insurance Claims.
description: To prohibit any health insurer from using artificial intelligence to deny health insurance claims.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Insurance and Real Estate

description: To adopt federal merger guidelines into the Connecticut Antitrust Act and authorize the Antitrust Section of the Office of the Attorney General to investigate and institute proceedings for alleged violations of the guidelines on behalf of the state and its residents.

description: To require the Office of Victim Services to develop programming that is (1) designed to encourage more victims of abuse to report their experiences, and (2) focused on improving support systems throughout the investigatory and court processes.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Concerning Enhanced Protections For Consumers Under The Uniform Commercial Code.
description: To ensure that consumers are not disadvantaged by outdated legal requirements under the Uniform Commercial Code.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

description: To make privileged and excluded from the category of communications that may constitute defamation a communication made by an individual, without malice, regarding an incident of sexual misconduct, sexual abuse, sexual assault or sexual harassment.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Concerning The Adoption Of The "castle Doctrine".
description: To fully adopt the "castle doctrine" by establishing a rebuttable presumption that if a homeowner believes it necessary to use deadly force to repel an intruder, then that belief is a reasonable belief.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Concerning The Duty To Retreat In A House Of Religious Worship.
description: To eliminate the requirement that a person in a house of religious worship retreat before using deadly force to defend himself or herself or a third person.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Prohibiting The Creation And Dissemination Of Artificial Intelligence-generated Pornographic Images Of A Person Without Consent.
description: To establish a criminal offense for the creation and dissemination of artificial intelligence-generated pornography.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Prohibiting The Creation And Dissemination Of Synthetic Intimate Images And Simulated Child Pornography.
description: To prohibit the creation and dissemination of synthetic intimate images without consent and simulated child pornography.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Concerning The Trust Act.
description: To enhance public safety and security and foster greater communication between law enforcement officers and federal immigration authorities regarding undocumented immigrants convicted of felonies and violent crimes.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Concerning Cooperation By State And Local Officials With Federal Personnel In The Enforcement Of Federal Immigration Law.
description: To ensure that local and state officials are fully cooperating with law enforcement personnel in the enforcement of federal immigration law.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Concerning Civil Actions Resulting From Deprivation Of Equal Protection Of The Laws Of The State Committed By An Elected State Official.
description: To ensure that state elected officials are held to the same standard as law enforcement personnel in protecting the constitutional rights of state residents.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Concerning Implementation And Oversight Of The Protect Act.
description: To strengthen the implementation and oversight of the Protect Act.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Eliminating The Labor Consultant Tax Deduction.
description: To eliminate the business tax deduction write off for businesses hiring consultants to discourage workers from voting for a union.
last_action: Change of Reference, Senate to Committee on Finance, Revenue and Bonding

title: An Act Concerning Minor Revisions To The Workers' Compensation Act.
description: To remove obsolete language from the Workers' Compensation Act.
last_action: House Passed

title: An Act Requiring A Statement Of A Public Employee's Right To Not Be A Member Of A Union.
description: To require clear and conspicuous notice of a public employee's right to not be a member of a union.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Labor and Public Employees

title: An Act Establishing A Task Force To Study Eliminating The Subminimum Wage For Persons With Disabilities.
description: To eliminate the subminimum wage for persons with disabilities.
last_action: Tabled for the Calendar, House

title: An Act Expanding Workers' Compensation Coverage For Post-traumatic Stress Injuries For Law Enforcement And First Responders.
description: To expand workers' compensation coverage for law enforcement and first responders experiencing post-traumatic stress injuries.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Labor and Public Employees

title: An Act Concerning Retirement Benefits And Workers' Compensation Benefits.
description: To prohibit employers from reducing retirement benefits due to an employee receiving workers' compensation benefits.
last_action: File Number 504

title: An Act Requiring Pensions For Police Officers And Firefighters Employed By Municipalities.
description: To require municipalities employing police officers and firefighters to provide such police officers and firefighters with pensions.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Labor and Public Employees

title: An Act Concerning The Provision Of Survivor Benefits To Certain Municipal Public Works Employees.
description: To require the provision of survivor benefits to survivors of municipal public works employees killed in the performance of their duties.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Planning and Development

title: An Act Concerning A Uniform State-wide Property Tax Rate For Motor Vehicles.
description: To replace the municipal property tax on motor vehicles with a state-wide property tax on motor vehicles at a fixed rate and distribute the revenue generated proportionally to municipalities based on what they currently collect for motor vehicle property tax.
last_action: Change of Reference, Senate to Committee on Finance, Revenue and Bonding

title: An Act Concerning The Installation Of Solar Power Generating Systems In Common Interest Ownership Communities.
description: To prohibit any common interest ownership community from prohibiting the installation of a solar power generating system on the roof of an owner's unit.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Planning and Development

title: An Act Concerning The Composition Of Municipal Traffic Authorities.
description: To specify that a traffic authority shall not be comprised of a board of police commissioners, chief of police or superintendent of police.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Planning and Development

title: An Act Concerning The Identification Of Graves.
description: To establish a procedure for municipal registrars of vital statistics to process requests to identify graves or other places of interment.
last_action: Public Hearing 02/19

title: An Act Amending The Charter Of The Lyme Grange Fair Association.
description: To allow the Lyme Grange Fair Association to hold property exceeding ten thousand dollars in value.
last_action: Change of Reference, Senate to Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Authorizing Municipalities To Impose A Tax On The Endowment Funds Of Private Institutions Of Higher Education.
description: To authorize municipalities to impose a tax on the endowment funds of a private institution of higher education located in the municipality.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Planning and Development

title: An Act Concerning The Transfer Or Sale Of Municipally Owned Open Space Land Or Forest Land.
description: To require municipalities to hold referenda to transfer or sell any parcel of municipally owned land that contains open space land or forested land.
last_action: Public Hearing 02/03

title: An Act Authorizing The Imposition Of A Fee For Single-use Paper Checkout Bags.
description: To authorize municipalities to require the imposition of a fee in the amount of two cents on each single-use paper checkout bag used at the point of sale in a retail establishment.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Planning and Development

title: An Act Requiring The Implementation Of A Reciprocal Food Truck Vendor Permit Or License.
description: To implement reciprocal permitting or licensing of food truck vendors that allows such vendors to operate in all municipalities in the state.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Public Health

title: An Act Concerning Hospital Financial Assistance.
description: To require each hospital to develop and implement a financial assistance program for certain patients and submit data regarding such program to the Department of Public Health.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Public Health

title: An Act Requiring Nursing Homes To Have An Automated External Defibrillator On Site.
description: To require all nursing homes to have an automated external defibrillator on site.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Public Health

title: An Act Establishing A Volunteer Medical License For Retired Physicians Seeking To Provide Pro Bono Medical Services To Indigent And Needy Patients.
description: To create a volunteer medical license for retired physicians who seek to provide pro bono medical services to indigent or needy patients.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Public Health

title: An Act Concerning Mold Remediation.
description: To establish requirements for mold remediation of rental housing units and licensure of mold remediation contractors.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Public Health

title: An Act Concerning Aid In Dying For Terminally Ill Patients.
description: To provide aid in dying to terminally ill patients.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Public Health

title: An Act Eliminating The Requirement That Food Protection Managers At Class 2 Food Establishments Pass A Test As Part Of A Food Protection Manager Certification Program.
description: To eliminate the requirement that food protection managers at class 2 food establishments satisfactorily pass a test as part of a food protection manager certification program.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Public Health

title: An Act Expanding The Scope Of Practice Of Dentists.
description: To allow dentists to administer injections for reasons other than pain management.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Public Health

title: An Act Requiring The Department Of Public Health To Create Educational Programs And Initiatives To Raise Awareness About The Disparities In Birth Outcomes For Black Women.
description: To improve maternal health outcomes for black women by requiring the establishment of educational programs and initiatives to address the underlying causes of birth outcome disparities in the black community.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Public Health

title: An Act Permitting A Religious Exemption To School Vaccination Requirements.
description: To allow parents to make certain health care decisions for their children consistent with their religious beliefs.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Public Health

title: An Act Concerning The Seizure And Sale Of Vehicles Involved In Street Takeovers.
description: To allow a municipality to seize and sell vehicles involved in street takeovers and to use the proceeds from any such sales to fund such municipality's police department.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Public Safety and Security

title: An Act Requiring The State To Enter Reciprocity Agreements With Certain States Regarding Permits To Carry A Pistol Or Revolver.
description: To enter into reciprocity agreements with the New England states to recognize permits to carry a pistol or revolver issued by said states.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Public Safety and Security

title: An Act Concerning Revenue Resulting From Certain Traffic Infractions And Violations In The Town Of Winchester.
description: To require that any revenue collected as a result of a traffic infraction or violation on United States Route 44 in the town of Winchester be paid to said town.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Public Safety and Security

title: An Act Concerning The Duties Of The Office Of The Inspector General And Actions Resulting From The Deprivation Of Equal Protection.
description: To (1) require determinations of whether certain deaths were suicides, (2) require recommendations concerning training to reduce the incidence of any such suicides, (3) update the amount of time allowed for bringing certain civil actions to be congruent with the release of report findings by the Office of the Inspector General, and (4) increase the transparency of and access to findings made by said office.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Public Safety and Security

title: An Act Requiring The Police Officer Standards And Training Council To Be Within The Department Of Emergency Services And Public Protection For Administrative Purposes Only.
description: To provide the Police Officer Standards and Training Council with independent authority and avoid any conflict of interest.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Public Safety and Security

title: An Act Concerning Police Officer Training Programs.
description: To allow the Police Officer Standards and Training Council to be responsive to recertification training needs, given the expanding and complex role of police officers and changes in technology, law and policing practices.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Public Safety and Security

title: An Act Concerning Police Officer Training Tiers.
description: To provide that the training requirements necessary for a police officer to renew such officer's certification shall be based on rank and assignment and categorized into three tiers.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Public Safety and Security

title: An Act Establishing Various Requirements Concerning Resident State Troopers.
description: To provide chief elected officials in municipalities where a resident state trooper is detailed with a defined scope of responsibility for policing the community.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Public Safety and Security

title: An Act Concerning The Management And Funding Of The Criminal Justice Information System.
description: To provide that (1) the Criminal Justice Policy and Planning Division within the Office of Policy and Management shall be responsible for managing and overseeing the development and use of the criminal justice information system, and (2) any funds appropriated for such system shall transfer to the Office of Policy and Management for such system.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Public Safety and Security

title: An Act Eliminating Fees Related To The Procurement Of Certain Permits.
description: To eliminate all fees related to the procurement of a permit to exercise any constitutional right.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Public Safety and Security

title: An Act Restoring Qualified Immunity For Law Enforcement Officers.
description: To reduce ambiguity and provide guidance for police officers regarding proper actions in the field.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Public Safety and Security

title: An Act Concerning The Offering Price Of A Motor Vehicle.
description: To provide transparency in the offering price of a motor vehicle.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Transportation

title: An Act Concerning Consumer Protection For Nonconsensual Towing On Private Property.
description: To provide twenty-four hours' notice prior to towing a motor vehicle from a residential complex unless the motor vehicle is parked in a space reserved for the exclusive use by persons who are blind and persons with disabilities, is blocking entry or exit from such residential complex or is located in an area not designated for parking.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Transportation

title: An Act Concerning The Administration Of The On-the-road Skills Test By Drivers' Schools For Persons With Disabilities.
description: To expand access to the on-the-road skills test for persons with disabilities by permitting a drivers' school to administer such test.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Transportation

title: An Act Requiring The Use Of Retro-reflective Paint For Lines On State Highways.
description: To require the use of retro-reflective paint when painting lines on all state highways to increase roadway safety and prevent incidents of wrong-way driving.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Transportation

title: An Act Concerning The Direct Sales Of Motor Vehicles.
description: To promote free market competition in motor vehicle sales.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Transportation

title: An Act Studying Public Transportation In The City Of Middletown.
description: To commission a study of public transportation in the city of Middletown.
last_action: Public Hearing 02/10

title: An Act Renaming A Bridge In The Town Of Brookfield In Honor Of Jason D. Lewis.
description: To rename a bridge in the town of Brookfield in honor of Jason D. Lewis.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Transportation

title: An Act Establishing A Pilot Program To Provide Driver Education To High School Students In The City Of Hartford.
description: To establish a pilot program to provide driver education for high school students in the city of Hartford.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Transportation

title: An Act Establishing An Interstate Route 84 Traffic Safety Corridor.
description: To establish an Interstate Route 84 traffic safety corridor and improve roadway safety and reduce traffic accidents through increased law enforcement and public awareness.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Transportation

title: An Act Concerning The Registration Of Composite Motor Vehicles.
description: To allow a composite motor vehicle to be registered as an antique, rare or special interest motor vehicle.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Transportation

title: An Act Concerning The Administration Of The Motor Vehicle Knowledge Test For Applicants With Reading Or Learning Disabilities.
description: To permit the oral examination of the motor vehicle knowledge test to applicants with reading or learning disabilities.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Transportation

title: An Act Concerning A Pilot Program For Test Preparation For A Motor Vehicle Operator's License In The City Of Hartford.
description: To establish a pilot program to assist Hartford residents to obtain motor vehicle operator's licenses.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Transportation

title: An Act Concerning The Installation Of Permanent Sound Barriers Along Interstate Route 95 In The Town Of Waterford.
description: To install permanent sound barriers along Interstate Route 95 in the town of Waterford to reduce noise pollution in nearby residential neighborhoods.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Transportation

title: An Act Concerning Parking Spaces Reserved For Persons With Young Children.
description: To require large parking lots to reserve parking spaces for persons with young children.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Transportation

title: An Act Concerning The Issuance Of Number Plates To Commemorate Juneteenth.
description: To create a special license plate that honors the historical and cultural importance of Juneteenth, the significance of emancipation and the ongoing pursuit of equity and justice.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Transportation

title: An Act Concerning Legislators' Salaries And Timely Passage Of The State Budget.
description: To encourage debate and passage of the state budget in a timely manner.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Appropriations

title: An Act Concerning Asthma Action Plans.
description: To require health care providers to create an asthma action plan during the required health assessment for each child diagnosed with asthma and to include such asthma action plan in the health assessment report health care providers submit to local or regional school districts.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Education

title: An Act Concerning Attendance By Board Of Education Members At Employment Contract Negotiations.
description: To require the attendance of at least one member of a local or regional board of education at any contract negotiations required pursuant to section 10-153d of the general statutes.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Education

title: An Act Concerning The Provision Of Services To Educators And School Personnel At School-based Health Centers.
description: To permit school-based health centers to provide services to educators and school personnel who work in the school facility where such school-based health center is located.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Education

title: An Act Concerning The Establishment Of A Minimum Starting Salary For Teachers And Paraeducators.
description: To establish a minimum starting salary for teachers and paraeducators employed in public schools.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Education

title: An Act Concerning Funding Of The Special Education Excess Cost Grant.
description: To ensure full funding of the special education excess cost grants for all towns.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Education

title: An Act Requiring Monthly Crisis Response Drills.
description: To require monthly crisis response drills at each public school.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Education

title: An Act Establishing A Working Group To Evaluate Changes To School Start Times.
description: To establish a working group to evaluate the feasibility of modifying school start times in the state to align with the recommendations of the American Academy of Pediatrics.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Education

title: An Act Concerning The Availability Of Menstrual Products In Schools.
description: To ensure the appropriate use of menstrual products provided to children in schools.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Education

title: An Act Concerning The Establishment Of A Matching Grant Program For The Hiring Of Special Education Teachers And Paraeducators.
description: To increase the number of special education teachers and paraeducators so that students receive more specialized instruction and the caseload for such special education educators is reduced.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Education

title: An Act Concerning The Disciplinary Hearing Process For Teachers.
description: To provide a similar standard in discipline and dismissal proceedings as provided for other employees of boards of education.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Education

title: An Act Concerning The Establishment Of A Matching Grant Program For The Hiring Of Additional Teachers And Paraeducators.
description: To provide grants to boards of education to increase the number of teachers and paraeducators per student.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Education

title: An Act Concerning Virtual Reality Training For Students In Career Exploration.
description: To expand and scale existing virtual reality training programs for high school students as part of career exploration.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Education

title: An Act Prohibiting Students Who Are Biological Males From Competing On Female-only Athletic Teams And Using Female-only Locker Rooms And Facilities.
description: To prohibit biological males from participating in girls' sports and accessing girls' locker rooms and bathrooms.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Education

title: An Act Concerning Parental Notification Of Behavior Intervention Meetings.
description: To maintain parents' and guardians' involvement in their child's mental and emotional well-being at school and build closer working relationships among parents and guardians, teachers, staff and administrators to protect children and improve educational and emotional outcomes.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Education

title: An Act Concerning A Limited Black Bear Hunting Season.
description: To manage the black bear population and protect residents of the state.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Environment

title: An Act Concerning Emission Standards For Vehicles Sold In The State.
description: To repeal the requirement to follow California vehicle emission standards and establish a requirement to follow such standards of the United States Environmental Protection Agency.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Environment

title: An Act Concerning The Connecticut Hydrogen And Electric Automobile Purchase Rebate Program And Electric Bicycles.
description: To authorize eligible adaptive electric bicycle purchasers to qualify for a rebate under the Connecticut Hydrogen and Electric Automobile Purchase Rebate program.
last_action: Change of Reference, Senate to Committee on Transportation

title: An Act Repealing The Bottle Bill And Providing For The Mandatory Recycling Of Such Beverage Containers.
description: To eliminate the financial and time burden placed on consumers and businesses by the provisions of the bottle bill.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Environment

title: An Act Concerning The Elimination Of The Restriction On Carrying Handguns In State Parks And Forests For Self-defense.
description: To authorize the carrying of handguns in state parks and forests for purposes of self-defense.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Environment

title: An Act Concerning A Report On The State's Potential Management Of The Colebrook River Lake.
description: To redesignate the water levels for the state's potential management of the Colebrook River Lake.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Environment

title: An Act Concerning Solar Installations In Certain Common Interest Ownership Communities.
description: To permit the installation of certain solar power generating systems that serve single-family detached units in common interest ownership communities.
last_action: Change of Reference, Senate to Committee on Planning and Development

title: An Act Requiring Legislative Approval Of The Combined Public Benefits Charge.
description: To repeal any component of the Combined Public Benefits Charge not approved by the General Assembly and require future charges be approved by the General Assembly.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Energy and Technology

title: An Act Concerning Municipal Referenda For Municipalities Impacted By Decisions Of The Connecticut Siting Council.
description: To require that, prior to any final decision of the Connecticut Siting Council concerning an application to develop a project, a municipal referendum be held by any municipality potentially affected by such decision.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Energy and Technology

title: An Act Exempting Machinery And Equipment Used In The Process Of Coloring Or Mixing Paint From The Sales And Use Taxes.
description: To exempt machinery and equipment used in the process of coloring or mixing paint and used by retailers that offer paint for sale from the sales and use taxes.
last_action: Public Hearing 02/26

title: An Act Apportioning The State's Electoral College Votes For President And Vice President Of The United States.
description: To award Connecticut's Electoral College votes based on results both state-wide and within each congressional district.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Government Administration and Elections

title: An Act Concerning The Agreement Among The States To Elect The President Of The United States By National Popular Vote.
description: To withdraw the state from the National Popular Vote Interstate Compact.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Government Administration and Elections

title: An Act Concerning The Adoption Of Atlantic Standard Time.
description: To require the state to adopt Atlantic Standard time upon the enactment of legislation in Massachusetts, Rhode Island and New York adopting said time and federal approval of such change.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Government Administration and Elections

title: An Act Concerning Gasoline Price Transparency.
description: To require gasoline retailers to disclose to consumers a breakdown of the various components comprising the retail price of gasoline.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on General Law

title: An Act Prohibiting Pay-if-paid Clauses In Construction Contracts And Ensuring Timely Payment Of Construction Subcontractors And Suppliers.
description: To prohibit pay-if-paid clauses in construction contracts and ensure timely payment of construction subcontractors and suppliers.
last_action: Public Hearing 02/26

title: An Act Requiring Homeowners Insurance Coverage For The Peril Of Collapse.
description: To require homeowners insurance policies to provide coverage for the peril of collapse.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Insurance and Real Estate

title: An Act Establishing A New Crime Of Murder For The Supply Of Illegal Drugs To A Victim Of An Overdose.
description: To establish a new crime of murder for those responsible for supplying illegal drugs to a victim of an overdose.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Adopting The Castle Doctrine.
description: To fully adopt the Castle Doctrine.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Reinstating The Death Penalty.
description: To reinstate the death penalty.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Concerning Fraudulent Misrepresentation As A Person With A Disability.
description: To provide that any person who fraudulently misrepresents that such person is a person with a disability for the purpose of receiving accommodations regarding service dogs afforded by the Americans with Disabilities Act shall be guilty of a misdemeanor.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Repealing The Trust Act.
description: To repeal the Trust Act.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Concerning The Consumption Of Cannabis In A Motor Vehicle.
description: To treat the use of cannabis in a motor vehicle in the same manner as the use of alcohol in a motor vehicle is treated.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Concerning Murder Committed In The Course Of A Domestic Violence Incident And The Issuance Of Criminal Protective Orders Against Convicted Perpetrators Of Domestic Violence.
description: To classify a murder committed in the course of a domestic violence incident as a murder with special circumstances and to require issuance of a criminal protective order as part of the sentence for a domestic violence conviction.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Concerning Enticement Of A Juvenile To Commit A Criminal Act.
description: To increase the penalty for an adult who entices a juvenile to commit a criminal act.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Concerning Consent Searches And Police Pursuits.
description: To allow police pursuits and consent searches.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Concerning Revocation Of Bond For Certain Violent Offenders.
description: To allow courts to hold without bail individuals who are a danger to the community.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Concerning The Use Of The Connecticut Juvenile Training School.
description: To reimagine and reopen the Connecticut Juvenile Training School for the purpose of providing better educational resources for high-risk pretrial offenders and their parents.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Raising The Penalty For Promotion Or Organization Of A Street Takeover.
description: To enhance penalties for individuals who organize or actively promote a street takeover.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Fully Funding The Excess Cost Grant.
description: To ensure full funding of the special education excess cost grants for all towns.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Education

title: An Act Concerning The Sales And Use Taxes Imposed On Meals Sold By An Eating Establishment, Caterer Or Grocery Store.
description: To eliminate the additional one per cent sales and use taxes imposed on meals sold by an eating establishment, caterer or grocery store.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Finance, Revenue and Bonding

title: An Act Limiting The Amount Of Retirement Income For Members Of The State Employees Retirement System.
description: To limit retirement income for members of the state employees retirement system to one hundred thousand dollars per year.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Labor and Public Employees

title: An Act Concerning Hazard Pensions For Certain Judicial Employees.
description: To add investigators in the Division of Public Defender Services and support service investigators in Support Enforcement Services to the definition of "hazardous duty member" for the purposes of the State Employees Retirement Act.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Labor and Public Employees

title: An Act Adjusting The Annual Increase To The Minimum Wage.
description: To adjust the annual increase to the minimum wage according to the percentage change in the employment cost index or not more than ten cents per hour, whichever is lower.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Labor and Public Employees

title: An Act Creating A Construction Pipeline Program.
description: To establish a Construction Pipeline Program.
last_action: File Number 549

title: An Act Limiting Remote Work For State Employees.
description: To establish limitations on remote work by state employees.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Labor and Public Employees

title: An Act Concerning Certain Determinations Of Fair Market Value For Purposes Of Property Taxation.
description: To specify that a municipal assessor shall not consider income generated by the sale of retail goods in determining fair market value for purposes of property taxation.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Planning and Development

title: An Act Concerning Political Activities Of Municipal Employees During Local Elections.
description: To impose restrictions on municipal employees modeled on the federal Hatch Act of 1939 to regulate the political activities of such employees in local elections.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Planning and Development

title: An Act Establishing A Property Tax Freeze For Certain Seniors And Reimbursing Municipalities For Lost Revenue.
description: To establish (1) a property tax freeze for seniors who meet certain income and asset thresholds, and (2) require the state to reimburse municipalities for the resulting revenue loss.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Planning and Development

title: An Act Concerning The Management, Care And Administration Of Cemeteries By The State On Behalf Of Cemetery Associations Pursuing Dissolution.
description: To aid in the transfer of operations of a cemetery when a cemetery association cannot locate a successor or purchaser.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Public Health

title: An Act Requiring Newborn Screening For Duchenne Muscular Dystrophy.
description: To require newborn screening for Duchenne muscular dystrophy.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Public Health

title: An Act Eliminating The Requirement For A Certificate Of Need For The Expansion Of Health Care Services.
description: To facilitate improved health care delivery and reduce health care costs by easing the ability of health care providers to increase the supply of health care services.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Public Health

title: An Act Concerning The Cause Of Death For Persons Who Self-administer Medication Prescribed To Bring About Death.
description: To provide notice to the next of kin that a member of the family passed away due to assisted suicide.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Public Health

title: An Act Concerning Inpatient Discharge Plans For Minors.
description: To require each inpatient health care service provider to create a minor patient discharge plan as soon as such minor patient shows improvement but not later than one week before discharging such patient.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Public Health

title: An Act Requiring The Provision Of Written Information By Pharmacists Concerning The Effects Of Mifepristone When Dispensing To A Patient.
description: To protect reproductive rights in cases where a woman decides to continue with a pregnancy.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Public Health

title: An Act Allowing Catalytic Converters To Be Received From Municipal Transfer Stations.
description: To enable municipal transfer stations to sell catalytic converters that have been deposited with such transfer stations.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Public Safety and Security

title: An Act Concerning The Maintenance Of Records Collected By License Plate Readers.
description: To protect personal privacy by prohibiting the state, a political subdivision of the state or a contractor that receives state funds from maintaining certain records concerning motor vehicles.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Public Safety and Security

title: An Act Concerning Firearm Magazine Limits And Declarations.
description: To afford persons the means to better exercise the constitutionally protected right to keep and bear arms.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Public Safety and Security

title: An Act Concerning The Expansion Of The Crisis Initiative Pilot Program Throughout The State.
description: To ensure that police officers throughout the state have the proper training and resources when dealing with someone who is in distress.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Public Safety and Security

title: An Act Eliminating The Fee For Certain Vehicles Exempt From Emission Inspections.
description: To make registering a new motor vehicle more affordable.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Transportation

title: An Act Increasing The Penalty For The Failure To Display Motor Vehicle Number Plates And Stickers.
description: To ensure registered motor vehicles properly display number plates and stickers so that such motor vehicles are identifiable to law enforcement.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Transportation

title: An Act Renaming A Bridge In The Town Of Brookfield In Honor Of Lance Corporal John T. Schmidt Iii.
description: To rename a bridge in the town of Brookfield in honor of Lance Corporal John T. Schmidt III.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Transportation

description: To prohibit any state employee from earning an annual salary greater than that of the Governor.
