title: An Act Amending A Prior Conveyance Of State Land To The Town Of Southbury To Change The Purpose.
description: To enable the town of Southbury to sell, lease, sublease or transfer the previously conveyed parcel to a third party for housing purposes.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Government Oversight

title: An Act Reducing State Elections Enforcement Commission Audits.
description: To reduce the number of candidate committee audits the State Elections Enforcement Commission conducts after an election or primary.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Government Oversight

title: An Act Concerning Nonpartisanship Of State Elections Enforcement Commission Staff.
description: To prohibit State Elections Enforcement Commission staff from engaging in partisan political activity.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Government Oversight

title: An Act Prohibiting The Disclosure Of The Residential Address Of Federal Prosecutors And Department Of Emergency Services And Public Protection Attorneys Under The Freedom Of Information Act.
description: To prohibit the residential address of any United States Attorney for the district of Connecticut and any attorney employed by the Department of Emergency Services and Public Protection from disclosure under the Freedom of Information Act.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Government Oversight

title: An Act Increasing The Investigatory Personnel Of The State Elections Enforcement Commission.
description: To add four full-time investigators and two full-time staff attorneys to the State Elections Enforcement Commission as investigatory personnel.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Government Oversight

title: An Act Making The Location Of Sexual Assault And Domestic Violence Centers And Associated Facilities Confidential Under The Freedom Of Information Act.
description: To protect the safety of sexual assault and domestic violence victims by restricting public access to the location of the centers and associated facilities that serve such victims.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Government Oversight

title: An Act Concerning The Process And Timeline For The Review Of Existing Regulations Of Connecticut State Agencies.
description: To make modifications to the process for reviewing agency regulations to determine whether they are obsolete, inconsistent or ineffective and change the deadlines for such review.
last_action: File Number 80

title: An Act Concerning The Student Loan Reimbursement Program.
description: To specify that the volunteer service requirement for the student loan reimbursement program includes volunteering for one or more nonprofit organizations or religious organizations or volunteering as a firefighter or emergency medical personnel.
last_action: Referred to Office of Legislative Research and Office of Fiscal Analysis 05/13/25 5:00 PM

title: An Act Concerning Instructors For An Airframe And Powerplant Certificate Program.
description: To specify the qualifications for instructors for an airframe and power plant certificate program operated by the Connecticut Technical Education and Career System.
last_action: File Number 141

title: An Act Funding Journalism Fellowships For Graduates Of Public Institutions Of Higher Education.
description: To establish and fund not fewer than twelve fellowship positions in local newsrooms for recent graduates of journalism programs at public institutions of higher education.
committee: Joint Higher Education and Employment Advancement
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Higher Education and Employment Advancement

title: An Act Expanding Training Programs For Careers In Health Care.
description: To establish a Career ConneCT program to fund training for certified nursing assistants and other health care occupations by organizations that hire directly into such organization's health care system and to appropriate not less than five million dollars for such program.
committee: Joint Higher Education and Employment Advancement
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Higher Education and Employment Advancement

title: An Act Concerning The Availability Of Emergency Contraception On The Campuses Of Institutions Of Higher Education.
description: To provide a one-time grant to institutions of higher education to install a vending machine that offers emergency contraceptives on campus based on a plan developed by students, administrators and any on-campus medical providers.
last_action: Favorable Change of Reference, Senate to Committee on Appropriations

title: An Act Requiring Review Of Purchase Card Transactions And Administrators Of Public Institutions Of Higher Education To Reside In The State.
description: To require (1) review of the purchase card transactions made by administrators of public institutions of higher education, and (2) such administrators to reside in the state within three months of being hired.
committee: Joint Higher Education and Employment Advancement
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Higher Education and Employment Advancement

title: An Act Concerning Medicaid Coverage Of Noninvasive, Custom Breast Prostheses For Mastectomy Patients.
description: To enhance, modernize and improve options for mastectomy patients whose care is covered by Medicaid.
last_action: Public Hearing 02/20

title: An Act Expanding Preventive Oral Health Services For Adult Medicaid Beneficiaries.
description: To improve adult oral health for Medicaid beneficiaries by expanding preventive services and increasing reimbursement rates for dental providers who serve Medicaid beneficiaries.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Human Services

title: An Act Concerning Childrens' Oral Health.
description: To improve oral health outcomes for children.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Human Services

title: An Act Concerning Equity In Medicaid Eligibility.
description: To end discrimination against elderly persons and persons with disabilities in determining eligibility for Medicaid.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Human Services

title: An Act Implementing The Recommendations Of A Report On Employment Assistance Programs For Individuals With Disabilities.
description: To enhance and expand employment opportunities for individuals with disabilities.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Human Services

title: An Act Establishing A Commission To Study A Husky For All Single Payer, Universal Health Care Program.
description: To establish a commission to conduct an economic analysis of establishing a single-payer universal health care program.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Human Services

title: An Act Concerning Medicaid Coverage For Peer Support Services For Mental Illness And Substance Use Disorder Treatment.
description: To provide Medicaid coverage for peer support services for mental health and substance use disorder treatment.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Human Services

title: An Act Concerning Recognizing Hearing Impairment As A Disability.
description: To statutorily recognize hearing impairment as a disability to allow for certain accommodations and state medical assistance for individuals in need.
last_action: Public Hearing 02/20

title: An Act Requiring Health Care Providers Who Receive Any State Funding To Accept Cash Payment For Services.
description: To mitigate the effects on persons without a credit card of prohibiting the use of cash to pay for treatment and related services by providers who receive payment from the state medical assistance program.
last_action: Public Hearing 02/20

title: An Act Reducing Barriers To Food Security.
description: To enhance access to nutritious food, support local economies and reduce barriers to food security in Connecticut.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Human Services

title: An Act Concerning Medicaid Coverage For Pan-ethnic Screening For Patients Who Are Pregnant Or Planning A Pregnancy.
description: To update and clarify documentation requirements for carrier screening preauthorization coverage to remove barriers to medically necessary prenatal care for Medicaid beneficiaries in the state.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Human Services

title: An Act Concerning An Equitable Medicaid Audit, Billing And Reimbursement Policy For Pharmacies.
description: To ensure a fair process for pharmacies regarding Medicaid billing and reimbursements.
last_action: Referred by House to Committee on Appropriations

title: An Act Concerning Husky Health Program Payment Parity For Safety Net Husky Dental Providers.
description: To establish payment parity for dentistry and dental hygiene services provided by "safety net" providers.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Human Services

title: An Act Concerning A Study Of "safety Net" Husky Dental Providers.
description: To study the effects on access to dental care and state cost of establishing a distinct category of HUSKY Health program dental providers.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Human Services

title: An Act Concerning State-funded Respite Care For Parents Of Children With Autism Spectrum Disorder.
description: To provide state-funded support to parents of children with autism spectrum disorder similar to such support offered to parents of children with an intellectual disability.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Human Services

title: An Act Concerning Husky Health Program Coverage For Children With Long Covid-19 Or Post-covid-19 Expenses Not Covered By Private Insurance.
description: To fill a gap in medical care for children with long COVID-19 or post-COVID-19 medical care needs not covered by private insurance.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Human Services

title: An Act Concerning Equitable Compensation For State-contracted, Nonprofit Human Services Providers.
description: To ensure adequate compensation for nonprofit providers of human services who contract with the state.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Human Services

title: An Act Concerning Prescription Drug Discount Transparency.
description: To ensure consumers are getting the benefit of drug discounts and not overpaying or being prematurely enrolled in Medicaid under rules deducting costs spent on prescription drugs from income.
last_action: Public Hearing 02/20

title: An Act Restoring 2016 Medicaid Payment Rates For Medication Administration.
description: To ensure adequate Medicaid payment rates for medication administration.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Human Services

title: An Act Establishing A Pilot Program To Mitigate The Benefits Cliff.
description: To mitigate benefits cliffs that occur when participants in public assistance programs lose benefits after their income surpasses certain thresholds.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Human Services

title: An Act Concerning Medicaid Rates For Custom Orthotics And Prosthetic Devices.
description: To assist persons with disabilities to have an improved quality of life with custom orthotic and prosthetic devices.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Human Services

title: An Act Concerning Medicaid Coverage Of Food As Medicine And Expanding Access To The Connecticut Farmers' Market/women, Infants And Children Nutrition Program.
description: To expand access to fruits and vegetables for families with low incomes.
last_action: Public Hearing 02/20

title: An Act Concerning Medicaid Coverage For Licensed International Board Certified Lactation Consultants.
description: To require Medicaid coverage consistent with federal law for Licensed International Board Certified Lactation Consultants.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Human Services

title: An Act Concerning Husky Health Program Payment Parity For Safety Net Husky Dental Providers.
description: To establish payment parity for dentistry and dental hygiene services provided by safety net providers.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Human Services

title: An Act Requiring Able-bodied Medicaid Recipients To Work Or Volunteer.
description: To require able-bodied Medicaid recipients to work or volunteer to receive or maintain Medicaid benefits.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Human Services

title: An Act Concerning An Independent Bureau Of Services For Persons Who Are Deaf, Deafblind Or Hard Of Hearing.
description: To confer independent status on the Bureau of Services for Persons Who are Deaf, Deafblind or Hard of Hearing.
last_action: Public Hearing 02/20

title: An Act Requiring Periodic Testing Of Able-bodied Beneficiaries Of Public Assistance For Illicit Drug Use.
description: To require able-bodied public assistance beneficiaries to comply with periodic testing for illicit drug use to receive benefits.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Human Services

title: An Act Concerning Improving Coordination And Cooperation Between Food Pantries And Homeless Shelters To Improve Access To Food And Resources.
description: To improve coordination between food pantries and homeless shelters in the state to ensure adequate access to food and resources for needy residents.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Human Services

title: An Act Requiring State-funded Family Planning Services Providers To File A Legislative Report On Services Provided And Any Reports Of Sexual Abuse.
description: To require family planning services providers that receive state funding to submit information detailing the services they provide and any incidents of sexual abuse reported by or to such provider involving a patient provided state-funded care.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Human Services

title: An Act Establishing A Radon Mitigation Assistance Program For Low-income Homeowners.
description: To establish a radon mitigation assistance program for low-income homeowners to reduce unsafe radon levels.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Housing

title: An Act Providing Incentives For Conversion Of Commercial Buildings To Mixed-use Developments.
description: To provide incentives for developers to convert commercial buildings to mixed-use developments.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Housing

title: An Act Concerning Removal Of An Unauthorized Individual From Residential Real Property.
description: To establish an expedited procedure for removal of an unauthorized individual from residential real property and a cause of action for wrongful removal.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Housing

title: An Act Providing Municipalities With Guidance On Addressing Large-scale Corporate Acquisitions Of Residential Properties.
description: To provide municipalities with guidance on addressing large-scale corporate acquisitions of residential properties in order to maintain affordable housing, protect local buyers and prevent corporate entities from destabilizing local housing markets.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Housing

title: An Act Appropriating Funds For Housing To State-recognized Tribes.
description: To provide funds for housing to state-recognized tribes.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Housing

title: An Act Exempting The Income Earned By A Child Of An Applicant From The Calculation Of Gross Income In Consideration For Participation In The Rental Assistance Program.
description: To exclude the income earned by a child, up to the age of twenty-six, of an applicant from inclusion in the calculation of gross income for consideration for participation in the rental assistance program.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Housing

title: An Act Establishing An Interagency Council On Homelessness.
description: To establish an interagency council on homelessness.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Housing

title: An Act Defining Squatter And Establishing A Process To Evict A Squatter.
description: To define a squatter and establish a process to evict a squatter.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Housing

title: An Act Appropriating Funds For Programs That Assist Persons Experiencing Homelessness.
description: To provide funding for programs administered by the Department of Housing that provide assistance to persons experiencing homelessness.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Housing

title: An Act Establishing A Program Offering Low-interest Loans To Homeowners To Replace Septic Systems And Install Flood Mitigation Systems.
description: To establish a program to offer low-interest loans to homeowners for the purpose of replacing existing septic systems and installing flood mitigation systems.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Housing

title: An Act Requiring The Department Of Housing To Conduct A Study To Determine The Need For Affordable Housing.
description: To require the Department of Housing to conduct a study to determine the need for affordable housing without including undocumented immigrants.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Housing

title: An Act Establishing A Grant Program To Create Affordable Housing Developments With Certain Deed Restrictions.
description: To establish a grant program to create affordable housing developments in which sixty per cent of dwelling units are deed restricted to individuals or families with a maximum income of thirty-five thousand dollars.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Housing

title: An Act Establishing A Tax Credit For The Conversion Of Vacant Commercial Buildings To Residential Developments.
description: To establish a tax credit for the conversion of vacant commercial buildings to residential developments, provided twenty-five per cent of all proposed dwelling units are affordable housing.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Housing

title: An Act Including Accessory Apartments In The Calculation Of The Threshold For Exemption From The Affordable Housing Appeals Procedure.
description: To include accessory apartments in the calculation of the threshold for exemption from the affordable housing appeals procedure.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Housing

title: An Act Including Workforce Housing In The Calculation Of The Threshold For Exemption From The Affordable Appeals Procedure.
description: To include workforce housing in the calculation of the threshold for exemption from the affordable housing appeals procedure.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Housing

title: An Act Concerning Fair Rent Commission Appeals.
description: To require that any appeal from a fair rent commission be in accordance with procedures set forth in section 4-183 of the general statutes.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Housing

title: An Act Including Properties That Are Able To Be Purchased By Persons Meeting Certain Income Requirements In The Calculation Of The Threshold For The Affordable Housing Appeals Procedure Exemption.
description: To include properties that are not deed restricted but able to be purchased by persons meeting certain income requirements in the calculation of the threshold for the affordable housing appeals procedure exemption.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Housing

title: An Act Establishing A Civil Penalty For A Municipality's Failure To Meet The Threshold For The Affordable Housing Appeals Procedure.
description: To establish a penalty against any municipality that does not meet the ten-per-cent threshold for the affordable housing appeals procedure.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Housing

title: An Act Establishing A Community Land Trust To Provide Additional Affordable Housing.
description: To establish a community land trust to provide more affordable housing.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Housing

title: An Act Concerning The Operation And Membership Of Fair Rent Commissions.
description: To establish procedures to ensure efficient operation of fair rent commissions.
last_action: Incorporated In HB-5605

title: An Act Requiring Each Municipality Establish A Fair Rent Commission Or Joint Fair Rent Commission.
description: To require each municipality to establish a fair rent commission or joint fair rent commission.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Housing

title: An Act Concerning Minimum Automobile Liability Insurance Coverage.
description: To: (1) Increase the minimum amount of financial responsibility coverage required for motor vehicles to one hundred thousand dollars for any one person and three hundred thousand dollars for more than one person, on account of any accident; and (2) require that any automobile liability insurance policy contain not less than five thousand dollars in medical payment coverage, provided such medical payment coverage may be waived if the policyholder provides proof of health insurance coverage.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Insurance and Real Estate

title: An Act Prohibiting Discrimination In Insurance Underwriting Based On The Breed Of A Homeowner's Dog.
description: To prohibit discrimination in insurance underwriting based on the breed of a homeowner's dog.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Insurance and Real Estate

title: An Act Requiring Health Insurance Coverage For Allergen Introduction Dietary Supplements For Infants.
description: To require that individual and group health insurance policies provide health insurance coverage for allergen introduction dietary supplements for infants to prevent peanut and egg allergy development.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Insurance and Real Estate

title: An Act Prohibiting The Use Of Drones By Homeowners Insurance Companies.
description: To prohibit any homeowners insurance company from using drones for inspection or surveillance purposes prior to offering homeowners insurance coverage, unless such homeowners insurance company provides at least seven business days' notice to such owner by mail or electronic mail, as determined by such owner, of such inspection or surveillance.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Insurance and Real Estate

title: An Act Concerning Compensation Of Pharmacists.
description: To require that pharmacists licensed in this state be compensated for certain health care services, including vaccine administration, flu or HIV testing and prescribing contraceptives.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Insurance and Real Estate

title: An Act Concerning The Definition Of "infertility".
description: To revise the definition of "infertility" for purposes of health insurance coverage under individual and group health insurance policies.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Insurance and Real Estate

title: An Act Establishing Standards For Insurance Companies To Terminate Coverage Or Adjust Premiums For Inspection Violations At Child Day Care Centers.
description: To establish a rubric standard for the ability of insurance companies to terminate coverage or adjust premiums at any child day care center based on inspection violations by such child day care center.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Insurance and Real Estate

title: An Act Requiring Health Carriers To Disclose Certain Information To Consumers.
description: To require any health carrier to provide certain information to consumers on such health carrier's Internet web site and on such consumers' policy documents, including information identifying how premium dollars are spent, claim denial rates and an explanation of costs for medical treatment, administrative expenses, profits and other expenses, to guide consumers in choosing a health carrier.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Insurance and Real Estate

title: An Act Requiring Cancellation Notices Of Property Or Casualty Insurance Coverage For Seniors.
description: To require any property or casualty insurance company to provide sufficient notice, in writing, to any policyholder who is sixty-five years of age or older or to such policyholder's authorized representative when such policyholder's coverage is in danger of, or has been, cancelled.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Insurance and Real Estate

title: An Act Prohibiting Health Carriers From Using Premiums To Engage In Lobbying Activities.
description: To prohibit any health carrier from using premiums to engage in lobbying activities with regard to governmental regulation of health insurance.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Insurance and Real Estate

title: An Act Prohibiting The Use Of Credit History Or Race In Underwriting Automobile Liability Or Homeowners Insurance.
description: To enact further protections for consumers to prohibit any automobile liability or homeowners insurance company from using credit history or race in underwriting or rating automobile liability or homeowners insurance policies.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Insurance and Real Estate

title: An Act Requiring Health Insurance Coverage For Reconstructive Surgery Following Skin Cancer On The Face.
description: To require that individual and group health insurance policies provide health insurance coverage for facial reconstructive surgery following treatment for skin cancer on the face, including, but not limited to, melanoma.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Insurance and Real Estate

title: An Act Concerning Health Insurance Coverage For Out-of-network Ground Transport Ambulance Charges.
description: To regulate health insurance coverage concerns not addressed by the federal No Surprises Act, 26 USC 9816, as amended from time to time, to ensure that individuals in this state do not receive surprise out-of-network ground transport ambulance charges for which health carriers are not obligated to provide coverage.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Insurance and Real Estate

title: An Act Requiring A Study Of The Feasibility Of Establishing A Captive Insurance Company To Provide Financial Assistance To Farmers Impacted By The Effects Of Severe Weather.
description: To require that the Insurance Commissioner, in consultation with the Commissioner of Agriculture, conduct a feasibility study for establishing a captive insurance company to provide financial assistance to farmers in the state impacted by the effects of severe weather.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Insurance and Real Estate

title: An Act Requiring That Resale Certificates Apply To Certain Common Interest Communities.
description: To require that the provisions of the Common Interest Ownership Act concerning resale certificates apply to common interest communities created in this state before January 1, 1984.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Insurance and Real Estate

title: An Act Concerning Mental Health And Substance Use Parity, Compliance And Transparency.
description: To: (1) Require each health carrier to submit an annual certification regarding compliance with applicable state and federal parity laws for mental health and substance use disorder benefits; (2) repeal state law provisions mandating confidential treatment of the names and identities of health carriers on annual nonquantitative treatment limitations filings; (3) establish a parity advancement account within the General Fund to fund initiatives supporting enforcement and consumer education; and (4) authorize the Insurance Commissioner to assess civil penalties for violations of parity laws by health carriers.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Insurance and Real Estate

title: An Act Regulating Accessibility And Costs Of Health Care In This State.
description: To: (1) Increase Medicaid reimbursement rates; (2) regulate medical debt; (3) regulate pharmacy benefits management practices; (4) conduct a study of, and provide consumers access to, the impact of vertical integration in the health care system in this state; (5) limit the use of prior authorization practices; and (6) regulate private equity acquisition of hospitals and medical care centers.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Insurance and Real Estate

title: An Act Concerning Coverage For Medically Necessary Treatment In This State.
description: To: (1) Require any health carrier to align coverage guidelines with the most recent evidence-based medical standards; (2) require transparency in health carriers' claim-review practices; (3) require coverage for medical treatments for life-saving care that are recommended by licensed health care provider specialists, unless medical evidence justifies denial of such coverage; (4) revise the process for review of adverse determinations to require (A) review of nonurgent care requests to be resolved within ten business days, and (B) review of urgent care requests to be resolved within forty-eight hours.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Insurance and Real Estate

title: An Act Allowing Nonprofits To Participate In Association Health Plans.
description: To allow nonprofits to participate in association health plans.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Insurance and Real Estate

title: An Act Concerning Credit Card Skimming.
description: To protect consumers from identity theft associated with credit card skimming.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Concerning The Castle Doctrine.
description: To fully adopt the Castle Doctrine.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Concerning The Adoption Of The Stand-your-ground Law.
description: To adopt stand-your-ground as law and remove the duty to retreat.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Expanding The Address Confidentiality Program To Include Real Property And Property Tax Records.
description: To expand the existing address confidentiality program for victims of certain enumerated crimes such as family violence to shield real property and property tax records containing such victim's name from disclosure.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Concerning Animal Abuse.
description: To increase the penalty for a first offense of starvation of, violence against or death of an animal and performing medical procedures or experimentation without a veterinarian license.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Concerning The Use Of "parenting Time" In The General Statutes.
description: To amend the general statutes to utilize "parenting time" instead of "custody" or "visitation" when describing time spent between a child and parent.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Permitting Incarcerated Persons To Be Debt-free Upon Release.
description: To allow a formerly incarcerated person an easier reentry into society.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Establishing A Cause Of Action For Tortious Interference With An Expected Inheritance.
description: To establish a civil cause of action for tortious interference with an expected inheritance.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Prohibiting The Appointment Of Counsel By The Office Of The Attorney General Or Any Other State Agency For Undocumented Immigrants During Deportation Proceedings.
description: To prohibit the appointment of counsel by the Office of the Attorney General or any other state agency for undocumented immigrants during deportation proceedings.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Concerning The Assertion Of A Special Defense Against A Claim Of Nonpayment Of A Common Expense Assessment.
description: To permit condominium unit owners to assert a special defense against a claim of nonpayment of a common interest assessment under certain circumstances.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Lowering The Fees Charged By The Office Of The Secretary Of The State For Obtaining An Apostille.
description: To reduce the cost of obtaining an apostille in the state.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Establishing A Cause Of Action Against A Person For Creating A Nuisance Due To The Smoke From Or Odor Of Cannabis.
description: To establish a cause of action against a person for a nuisance caused by the smoke from or odor of cannabis that results in interference with the use of one's property.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Concerning The Composition And Operational Procedures Of The Judicial Selection Commission.
description: To revise statutory provisions concerning: (1) The composition of the Judicial Selection Commission; and (2) certain internal operational procedures concerning decisions issued by said commission.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Establishing Speedy Eviction Proceedings For The Removal Of Squatters.
description: To establish an expedited process for the eviction of persons unlawfully occupying premises with no legal right to do so.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Concerning The Establishment Of A Case-tracking System For Divorce Proceedings Involving Domestic Violence.
description: To strengthen court supports for a victim of domestic violence who is involved in a divorce proceeding.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Requiring The Adoption Of The National Commission On Correctional Health Services Standards And Accreditation Requirements By The Department Of Correction.
description: To establish mandatory adoption of National Commission on Correctional Health Care standards and accreditation requirements for Department of Correction facilities, ensuring standardized high-quality health care services for persons who are incarcerated.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Concerning The Use Of Supported Decision-making Agreements In Lieu Of Conservatorships Or Guardianships.
description: To implement the use of supported decision-making agreements as a less restrictive alternative to the use of conservatorships or guardianships for adults with disabilities.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Establishing A Pilot Program For The Mediation Of Condominium-related Disputes.
description: To establish a program within the Probate Court system for the mediation of disputes that arise between condominium unit owners and associations.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Requiring The Stay Of Execution Of A Probate Court Order Authorizing The Administration Of Shock Therapy.
description: To require an automatic stay of execution of a Probate Court order authorizing the administration of shock therapy to a respondent in order to allow the respondent sufficient time to seek review of such order.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Concerning The Duties And Responsibilities Of Probate Court Judges.
description: To establish requirements applicable to Probate Court judges that eliminate potential conflicts of interest, enhance professionalism and conform with requirements applicable to other members of the judiciary.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Concerning A Property Owner's Liability For Expenses Incurred As A Result Of A Falling Tree Or Tree Limb.
description: To incentivize the responsible stewardship of trees on privately owned real property and protect neighboring property and occupants.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Concerning A Probate Court Venue For The Filing Of A Petition Relating To The Administration Of Electroconvulsive Therapy To A Patient.
description: To remove a barrier to electroconvulsive treatment for a patient who is not hospitalized in a location where such treatment is medically advised.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Concerning The Court Award Of Attorney's Fees In Bad Faith Affordable Housing Appeals.
description: To authorize a court to assess attorney's fees against a losing party in an action brought under section 8-30g of the general statutes if the court determines that the action was brought in bad faith.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Reducing The Filing Fee For Annual Reports Filed By Certain Business Entities With The Office Of The Secretary Of The State.
description: To assist small businesses by decreasing the amount of the fee for filing annual business reports with the Office of the Secretary of the State from eighty dollars to forty dollars.
last_action: Change of Reference, Senate to Committee on Finance, Revenue and Bonding

title: An Act Allowing For The Provision Of Child Support For Children Under The Age Of Twenty-one.
description: To ensure that children of families who would have provided financial support to their children in their young adult years had the family remained intact continue to benefit from the financial support when the family is no longer intact.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Establishing A Cause Of Action Against The State For Injury Or Illness Caused To A Student As A Result Of Vaccination Or Medicinal Treatment Requirements.
description: To create a cause of action allowing a student to recover actual and punitive damages for injuries or illness caused by a vaccination or medicinal treatment program if the state required the student to receive the vaccine or medicinal treatment as a condition of school admission.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Establishing Caseloads For Public Defenders.
description: To alleviate the burden placed on the state's public defenders who experience high caseloads, making it difficult to provide adequate legal representation to high-needs populations.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Concerning The Authority Of The Probate Court To Order A Person With Intellectual And Developmental Disabilities To Submit To An Involuntary Medical Evaluation And Assisted Outpatient Medical Treatment.
description: To provide the Probate Court and conservators of the person with greater authority to order a person with intellectual and developmental disabilities to submit to an involuntary medical evaluation and assisted outpatient medical treatment.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Concerning The Use Of Governmental Immunity As A Defense In Civil Actions Resulting From Deprivation Of Equal Protection Of The Laws Of The State Committed By A State Elected Official.
description: To ensure state elected officials are held to the same standard as police officers in protecting the Constitutional rights of state residents.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Prohibiting State Agencies From Taking Certain Actions Against Parents And Guardians Who Choose To Raise Children Consistent With Their Biological Sex.
description: To prohibit state agencies from taking certain action against a parent or guardian if the basis for such action relates solely to such parent's or guardian's decision to raise a child consistent with such child's biological sex.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Children

title: An Act Increasing The Per-child Foster Care Maintenance Payment Rate.
description: To increase the per-child foster care maintenance payment rate to one thousand one hundred dollars per month.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Children

title: An Act Concerning Notice Of Firearms By Operators Of Family Child Care Homes.
description: To require (1) family child care home operators to notify parents and guardians of the presence of firearms, and (2) the Office of Early Childhood to take adverse licensing action against operators for violation of said requirement.
last_action: File Number 31

title: An Act Requiring The Establishment Of Blocked Trust Accounts For Certain Minors.
description: To require any parent or guardian who receives income from the creation of online content featuring a minor in such parent or guardian's care to establish a blocked trust account, which shall be accessible to such minor when such minor turns eighteen years of age.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Children

title: An Act Extending Financial Assistance For The Postsecondary Education Expenses Of Foster Youth.
description: To require the Department of Children and Families to continue to provide financial aid for the postsecondary education expenses for foster youth until such youth reaches twenty-eight years of age.

title: An Act Concerning The Appointment Of The Child Advocate.
description: To modify the appointment process for the Child Advocate.

title: An Act Concerning The Treatment Of Children With Gambling Disorders.
description: To (1) permit counselors certified by the International Gambling Counselor Certification Board to treat gambling disorders in children sixteen years of age or older without notifying such children's parents or guardians, and (2) require the Department of Children and Families to employ a clinician certified by the International Gambling Counselor Certification Board.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Children

title: An Act Concerning The Consumption Of Energy Drinks By Children.
description: To establish a working group to study the medical risks associated with the consumption of energy drinks by children and effects of a prohibition on the sale of energy drinks to children, and require signage related to the medical risks associated with the consumption of energy drinks by children.
last_action: File Number 32

title: An Act Concerning Medical Records Pertaining To Prenatal Care And Mandated Reports.
description: To specify that a mandated reporter shall not include medical records pertaining to prenatal care in a report to the Commissioner of Children and Families.
last_action: File Number 155

title: An Act Concerning The Manufacturing Innovation Fund.
description: To supply funding to be deposited into the Manufacturing Innovation Fund to support manufacturing apprenticeships in the state.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Appropriations

title: An Act Concerning The Time For Passage Of The State Budget.
description: To prevent legislators and constitutional officers from being paid unless a state budget is passed on time.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Appropriations

title: An Act Appropriating Funds To The Department Of Veterans Affairs For Advertising Campaigns To Promote Awareness Of Mental And Behavioral Health Resources.
description: To appropriate funds to the Department of Veterans Affairs for purposes of advertising campaigns to promote awareness of mental and behavioral health resources available to veterans.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Appropriations

title: An Act Concerning Funding For The Occupational And Professional Licensing Division Within The Department Of Consumer Protection.
description: To fund additional in-the-field license inspector positions in the Occupational and Professional Licensing Division of the Department of Consumer Protection.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Appropriations

title: An Act Concerning Funding To Compensate Municipalities For Costs Incurred Because Of Early Voting.
description: To help our towns cover the costs of early voting.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Appropriations

title: An Act Concerning Continued Funding Support For The Governor's Foot Guards And Horse Guards.
description: To preserve the Governor's Foot Guards and Horse Guards and the property where the Governor's Horse Guards' headquarters is located in the town of Avon.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Appropriations

description: To prohibit the Office of Equity and Opportunity from receiving any state funds to support the office or its functions.

description: To establish a task force to study teacher compensation.

title: An Act Prohibiting Student Athletes Who Were Born As Males From Participating In Women's Interscholastic Athletic Events.
description: To eliminate unfair competition in women's interscholastic sporting competition.

description: To create education savings accounts.

description: To establish a registration system for service animals and emotional support animals.

description: To (1) require certain concrete aggregate producers to (A) periodically provide geological source reports to the State Geologist and the Commissioner of Energy and Environmental Protection, and (B) submit an operations plan to the State Geologist and the commissioner, and (2) require certain concrete producers to confirm that concrete aggregate satisfies various statutory requirements.

description: To prohibit the use of steel-jaw leghold traps on bodies of water.

description: To require manufacturers and contract testing facilities to use other testing methods than animal testing when such other methods are available.

description: To repeal certain greenhouse gas emission reduction goals.

title: An Act Concerning The Establishment Of A Climate Change Superfund.
description: To fund climate mitigation, resiliency and adaptation projects.

title: An Act Concerning The Declawing Of Cats.
description: To prohibit the declawing of cats.

title: An Act Prohibiting The Use Of Dogs For The Testing Of Consumer Products Not Intended For Dogs.
description: To prohibit the use of dogs for the testing of consumer products.

description: To manage the black bear population and protect the residents of the state.

description: To provide for the safe disposal of marine and road flares that have expired.

description: To prohibit the inhumane practice of declawing cats except when medically necessary.

title: An Act Concerning Nips.
description: To remove a persistent source of litter in municipalities and reduce a concealable source of alcohol.

title: An Act Authorizing The Use Of Drones To Analyze, Treat And Apply Fertilizers And Pesticides To Crops.
description: To allow the use of precision drone technology by Federal Aviation Administration licensed pilots and licensed commercial and private pesticide applicators to analyze, treat and apply fertilizers and pesticides on crops in order to reduce the environmental impact compared to existing methods.

title: An Act Concerning The Renewable Portfolio Standard, The Public Utilities Regulatory Authority And Public Utility Affiliate Entities And Requiring A Study Of The Electric Grid Of The State.
description: To (1) redefine "class I renewable energy source" to include any nuclear or hydropower energy source, (2) increase oversight of the Public Utilities Regulatory Authority, (3) require an audit of the Combined Public Benefits Charge and any program supported by such charge, (4) require functional and operational separation of unregulated or underregulated affiliates of public utilities, (5) impose revenue transfer caps, (6) require a line-item audit of large electricity generation facilities, and (7) require a comprehensive study of the viability of the electric grid in the state.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Energy and Technology

title: An Act Concerning The Deployment Of Solar Energy Sources In The State.
description: To (1) set a goal of five hundred megawatts of solar photovoltaic electricity generation in the state not later than the year 2027, (2) remove the capacity limit on the Non-residential Renewable Energy Solutions Program, (3) extend the duration of the Shared Clean Energy Facility Program, (4) impose a uniform capacity tax for grid-scale solar photovoltaic installations, (5) streamline the process by which solar photovoltaic facilities are connected to the grid, and (6) create a solar advancement commission for the purpose of making policy recommendations concerning solar deployment in the state.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Energy and Technology

title: An Act Allowing For The Creation Of Municipal Electric Companies By Referenda And Establishing The Connecticut Public Transmission Authority And The Connecticut Public Power Corporation.
description: To (1) allow any political subdivision of the state, including a municipality or regional council of governments, to hold a referendum to establish or join a municipal electric company, (2) establish a quasi-public entity known as the "Connecticut Public Transmission Authority" to acquire existing electric transmission assets from private entities at fair market value and to own, operate and maintain such assets in the state, and (3) establish a nonprofit entity known as the "Connecticut Public Power Corporation" to generate class I renewable energy sources in the state.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Energy and Technology

title: An Act Repealing Any Charge Included In The Combined Public Benefits Charge.
description: To repeal any component of the Combined Public Benefits Charge.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Energy and Technology

title: An Act Exempting Solar Carports Or Canopies From The State Building Code.
description: To exempt solar photovoltaic carports or canopies from compliance with the provisions of the State Building Code.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Energy and Technology

title: An Act Repealing The Renewable Portfolio Standard.
description: To repeal the renewable portfolio standard.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Energy and Technology

title: An Act Establishing A Community Access Television Task Force.
description: To review statutes concerning the state funding sources for community access television channels.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Energy and Technology

title: An Act Concerning Municipal Electric Companies And Joint Powers Authorities.
description: To (1) allow a municipality to establish a municipal electric company to provide electricity for residents of the municipality, and (2) establish a joint powers authority for the purpose of providing electrical supply, developing solar and battery projects and creating programs to encourage energy efficiency, electrical demand management and electric vehicle charger deployment.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Energy and Technology

description: To require the Connecticut Siting Council to (1) consider the testimony of any witness and of the chief executive officer of the municipality in which a proposed facility is to be developed, (2) be bound by the approval, disapproval or imposition of conditions by the chief executive officer of the municipality in which a solar photovoltaic system with a generating capacity greater than one megawatt is proposed if such proposed system is located within a five-mile radius of any solar photovoltaic system with a generating capacity greater than one hundred megawatts, and (3) maintain distribution capacity for local projects that benefit schools, municipal, agricultural or local industry.
last_action: Change of Reference, Senate to Committee on Government Administration and Elections

title: An Act Exempting Certain Large-scale Residential Solar Installations From Participation In The Non-residential Energy Solutions Program.

title: An Act Establishing A Task Force To Study Converting Biosolids Into Energy.
description: To create a task force to study converting biosolids into energy.

description: To require training standards and a certification process for solar panel installation workers.

title: An Act Requiring An Audit Of Programs Funded By The Combined Public Benefits Charge.
description: To require an audit of programs funded by the Combined Public Benefits Charge on end use customer electric bills.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Energy and Technology

title: An Act Concerning Small Hydropower Facilities.
description: To require electric distribution companies to purchase electricity supplied by small hydropower facilities.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Energy and Technology

title: An Act Concerning Funding For Reimbursement To Municipalities For Revenue Loss Associated With The Veterans Property Tax Credit.
description: To require the state to partially reimburse municipalities for the cost associated with administering the veterans' property tax credit.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Finance, Revenue and Bonding

title: An Act Reducing The Manufacturer's License Fee For Camp Trailers.
description: To reduce the manufacturer's license fee for camp trailers to one hundred dollars.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Finance, Revenue and Bonding

title: An Act Limiting The Projects Eligible For Grants From The Small Town Economic Assistance Program.
description: To limit grants from the small town economic assistance program to only those projects necessary to maintain public health and safety and for critical infrastructure.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Finance, Revenue and Bonding

title: An Act Concerning The Apprenticeship Training Tax Credit.
description: To increase the maximum amount of the corporation business tax credit for wages paid to apprentices in the construction trades from four thousand dollars to seven thousand five hundred dollars per apprentice.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Finance, Revenue and Bonding

title: An Act Exempting Farm Vehicles From The Highway Use Tax.
description: To exempt farm vehicles from the highway use tax.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Finance, Revenue and Bonding

title: An Act Concerning The Inclusion Of The State's Tax Expenditures As A Consideration Of The Fiscal Controls Of The State.
description: To include the state's tax expenditures as a consideration of the fiscal controls of the state.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Finance, Revenue and Bonding

title: An Act Authorizing Bonds Of The State For The Development Of Affordable Housing.
description: To provide funds for the development of affordable housing developments.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Finance, Revenue and Bonding

title: An Act Concerning The Sales Price Threshold Of Motor Vehicles Subject To A Higher Sales And Use Taxes Rate.
description: To increase to more than seventy-five thousand dollars the sales price threshold for a motor vehicle subject to the seven and three-fourths per cent sales and use taxes rate.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Finance, Revenue and Bonding

title: An Act Concerning The Collection Costs Of State Taxes And Fees.
description: To require each state agency to evaluate the collection costs of taxes and fees administered and to eliminate any tax or fee for which the cost of collection exceeds the revenue received by the state from the imposition of such tax or fee.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Finance, Revenue and Bonding

title: An Act Establishing A Fee On Retail Delivery Service To Fund Bus Public Transportation Fare Reductions.
description: To establish a fee on certain retail deliveries and dedicate the revenue from such fee to reducing the fare for bus public transportation.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Finance, Revenue and Bonding

title: An Act Eliminating The Qualifying Income Thresholds For The Personal Income Tax Deductions For Social Security Benefits.
description: To eliminate the qualifying income thresholds for the personal income tax deductions for Social Security benefits.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Finance, Revenue and Bonding

title: An Act Eliminating The Qualifying Income Thresholds For The Personal Income Tax Deductions For Social Security Benefits, Pension Or Annuity Income And Certain Individual Retirement Account Distributions.
description: To eliminate the qualifying income thresholds for the personal income tax deductions for Social Security benefits, pension or annuity income and distributions from individual retirement accounts.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Finance, Revenue and Bonding

title: An Act Concerning Municipalities Eligible To Propose Projects For Consideration By The Community Investment Fund 2030 Board.
description: To allow municipalities with an economically distressed census tract located within such municipality to propose eligible projects for consideration by the Community Investment Fund 2030 Board.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Finance, Revenue and Bonding

title: An Act Prohibiting Lobbyist Contributions During A Legislative Session To Legislators Or State Officers Running For Municipal Office.
description: To prohibit lobbyist contributions during a legislative session to legislators or state officers running for municipal office.
last_action: File Number 682

title: An Act Reducing The Number Of Days Of Early Voting.
description: The reduce the number of days of early voting at elections and primaries.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Government Administration and Elections

title: An Act Concerning Registrars Of Voters.
description: To eliminate as obsolete various provisions related to registrars of voters being required to schedule and hold sessions at their offices specifically for the purpose of admitting electors prior to elections.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Government Administration and Elections

title: An Act Concerning Persons Experiencing Homelessness And Same-day Election Registration.
description: To allow persons experiencing homelessness to utilize the same-day election registration process to be able to cast a ballot at an election.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Government Administration and Elections

title: An Act Limiting The Authority Of The Secretary Of The State With Regard To Election Laws.
description: To limit the authority of the Secretary of the State with regard to election laws.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Government Administration and Elections

title: An Act Reducing The Maximum Allowable Thc Content Of Cannabis And Cannabis Products Sold To Consumers In The Recreational Cannabis Market.
description: To provide that no cannabis establishment shall sell to any consumer any cannabis flower, cannabis plant material or other cannabis product with a total THC concentration, calculated on a dry-weight basis, that is greater than fifteen per cent.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on General Law

title: An Act Concerning Acceptable Forms Of Payment For Consumer Goods And Services.
description: To require any person who offers any consumer good or service to consumers to accept cash as a form of payment.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on General Law

title: An Act Requiring The Secretary Of The Office Of Policy And Management To Submit An Annual Report Concerning State Contracts Awarded To Out-of-state Businesses.
description: To require the Secretary of the Office of Policy and Management to submit an annual report concerning any state contracts awarded to out-of-state businesses.
last_action: Public Hearing 02/13

title: An Act Repealing A Prior Conveyance Of A Parcel Of State Land To The Town Of East Haddam.
description: To repeal special act 23-30, which required the conveyance of a certain parcel of state land to the town of East Haddam.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Government Oversight

title: An Act Concerning Intercollegiate Female Sports Team Competitions.
description: To prohibit a publicly funded intercollegiate female sports team from competing against any team on which there is a player whose assigned sex at birth is male, except competitions held only for exhibition purposes.
committee: Joint Higher Education and Employment Advancement
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Higher Education and Employment Advancement

title: An Act Reinstating The Regional Community-technical Colleges.
description: To reinstate the twelve regional community-technical colleges as separate public institutions of higher education.
committee: Joint Higher Education and Employment Advancement
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Higher Education and Employment Advancement

title: An Act Prohibiting Use Of Diversity, Equity And Inclusion Considerations At Public Institutions Of Higher Education.
description: To prohibit public institutions of higher education from (1) maintaining an office for diversity, equity and inclusion, (2) requiring a diversity statement, and (3) considering a person's immutable characteristics in any admissions, scholarship, grading or employment decisions.
committee: Joint Higher Education and Employment Advancement
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Higher Education and Employment Advancement

title: An Act Concerning Increasing The State Portion Of Payments Made To Critical Care Providers Under The Medical Assistance Program.
description: To increase the state portion of payments to providers who are reimbursed under the medical assistance program.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Human Services

title: An Act Concerning Family Home-care Services.
description: To improve home-care services in the state, allow more senior citizens to age in place at home and avert state costs on institutional care.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Human Services

title: An Act Concerning The Income Threshold For Tenants Renting A Dwelling Unit In A Set-aside Development.
description: To permit a tenant renting a dwelling unit in a set-aside development to continue renting such dwelling unit for three years after such tenant's income exceeds the statutory income threshold.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Housing

title: An Act Including Affordable Housing Developments With Commercial Space In The Calculation Of The Threshold For The Affordable Housing Appeals Procedure Exemption And Prohibiting Applications Once A Municipality Has Applied For A Moratorium.
description: To include affordable housing developments that have ground floor commercial space in the calculation of the threshold for the affordable housing appeals procedure exemption and prohibit the filing of affordable housing applications once a municipality has applied for a certificate of affordable housing completion.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Housing

title: An Act Expanding The Time To Own Program And Setting Aside Funds For Teachers And Early Childhood And Child Care Professionals.
description: To expand the Time to Own program and set aside funds for teachers and early childhood and child care professionals.
last_action: Public Hearing 02/13

title: An Act Prohibiting A Landlord From Demanding A Security Deposit In Excess Of One Month's Rent From Any Tenant.
description: To prohibit a landlord from demanding a security deposit in excess of one month's rent from any tenant.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Housing

title: An Act Permitting Removal Of An Unauthorized Individual From Real Property.
description: To allow law enforcement to remove an individual who is unlawfully occupying real property in lieu of requiring a summary process action.
last_action: Referred by House to Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Concerning Summary Process Evictions Of Protected Tenants.
description: To require a landlord to seek approval from a fair rent commission or the Superior Court prior to initiating a summary process eviction of a protected tenant.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Housing

title: An Act Expanding The Open Choice Voucher Pilot Program.
description: To expand the Open Choice Voucher pilot program.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Housing

title: An Act Concerning A Landlord's Ability To Enter A Dwelling Unit For The Purposes Of Showing Such Unit To Potential Purchasers Or Tenants.
description: To prohibit a tenant from refusing to allow a landlord to enter such tenant's dwelling unit for the purposes of showing such dwelling unit to potential purchasers or tenants.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Housing

title: An Act Establishing A Housing Development Authority To Promote Permanent Affordable Housing.
description: To establish a Housing Development Authority to promote permanent affordable housing.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Housing

title: An Act Concerning Municipal Storage Of Possessions And Personal Effects Of Evicted Tenants.
description: To eliminate the requirement that a municipality store the possessions and personal effects of an evicted tenant and require that such tenant be responsible for all costs associated with such storage.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Housing

title: An Act Concerning Certain Protections For Group And Family Child Care Homes.
description: To clarify and enforce protections for licensed group child care homes and licensed family child care homes and prevent landlords and common interest communities from placing restrictions on the operations of such homes.
last_action: Change of Reference, Senate to Committee on Children

title: An Act Prohibiting A Municipality From Imposing A Penalty On Homeless Persons For Undertaking Life-sustaining Activities On Public Land.
description: To prohibit a municipality from imposing a penalty on homeless persons for undertaking life-sustaining activities on public land.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Housing

title: An Act Requiring That A Municipality Receive Credit Under The Affordable Housing Appeals Procedure Exemption Upon Approval Of An Affordable Housing Application.
description: To require that a municipality receive credit for affordable housing dwelling units upon approval of an affordable housing application.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Housing

title: An Act Establishing A Down Payment Assistance Program And Appropriating Funds For Such Program.
description: To establish a down payment assistance program and provide funds for such program.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Housing

title: An Act Expanding The Protection Of Just Cause Eviction To All Tenants.
description: To expand the protection of just cause eviction to all tenants.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Housing

title: An Act Establishing A Revolving Loan Fund To Create Affordable Housing Developments.
description: To establish a revolving loan fund to create affordable housing developments.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Housing

title: An Act Requiring Accessibility Of Records To Unit Owners In Common Interest Community Associations.
description: To improve transparency for unit owners in common interest community associations.
last_action: Change of Reference, Senate to Committee on Insurance and Real Estate

title: An Act Prohibiting A Moratorium From The Affordable Housing Appeals Procedure.
description: To prohibit a moratorium from the affordable housing appeals procedure.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Housing

title: An Act Including In The Calculation Of The Threshold For Exemption From The Affordable Housing Appeals Procedure Any Property That Is Located On A Public Drinking Watershed Or An Aquifer Protection Area.
description: To include property located on a public drinking watershed or an aquifer protection area in the calculation of the threshold for exemption from the affordable housing appeals procedure.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Housing

title: An Act Appropriating Funds For Homeless Shelters.
description: To provide funds for homeless shelters.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Housing

title: An Act Permitting A Landlord To Inspect Rental Housing Units Every Six Months.
description: To permit a landlord to inspect rental housing units every six months to assess any damage.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Housing

title: An Act Requiring Health Insurance Coverage For Biomarker Testing.
description: To require that individual and group health insurance policies provide coverage for biomarker testing.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Insurance and Real Estate

title: An Act Establishing A Nonwaivable Right To A Home Inspection For A Purchaser Of Residential Property.
description: To give a purchaser of residential property a nonwaivable right to obtain a home inspection.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Insurance and Real Estate

title: An Act Concerning False Accusations Of Criminal Activity.
description: To limit losses for people falsely accused of a crime.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Concerning The Consumption Of Cannabis Products In Motor Vehicles.
description: To prevent death and injury by impaired drivers.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Concerning The Penalty For Vehicular Manslaughter.
description: To increase the penalty for individuals guilty of vehicular manslaughter.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Concerning Bail And Penalties For Offenders Who Drive Under The Influence.
description: To reduce the opportunity for persons who drive under the influence to reoffend.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Eliminating Incarceration As A Sanction For A Noncriminal Technical Probation Violation And Concerning Other Probation System Reforms.
description: To reform the probation system by eliminating incarceration for noncriminal technical violations, introducing earned time credit and removing burdensome supervision fees in order to incentivize success, reduce caseloads and reduce the trauma of arrest.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Assisting Parents Currently Incarcerated For Nonviolent Crimes In Foreign Jurisdictions.
description: To assist parents currently incarcerated for nonviolent crimes in foreign jurisdictions.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Concerning Traffic Safety Enforcement And Certain Criminal Offenses.
description: To prohibit the dismissing or lessening of charges concerning offenses related to driving at an excessive speed, illegal firearms, reckless driving and stolen cars.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

description: To assess the practicality and potential impacts of relocating the New Haven and Bridgeport Correctional Centers due to their proximity to residential areas, in order to create better neighborhood conditions.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Concerning The Psychiatric Security Review Board.
description: To reform the Psychiatric Security Review Board's management of the confinement and release of persons found not guilty by reason of insanity.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Concerning Unlawful Discharge Of A Firearm.
description: To protect and clarify the right to use a firearm in self-defense.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Concerning Judicial Review Of Probation Sentences.
description: To allow judicial review to terminate or reduce probation for those with mandatory probation sentences after five years of successfully completed supervision.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Requiring State Law Enforcement Agencies To Cooperate With The Federal Office Of Immigration And Customs Enforcement.
description: To require that state law enforcement agencies cooperate with the Office of Immigration and Customs Enforcement.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Increasing Penalties For Motor Vehicle Theft.
description: To increase penalties for motor vehicle thefts.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Concerning The Penalty For Organizing Street Takeovers.
description: To enhance penalties for individuals who organize, or actively promote, so-called street takeovers.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Enhancing The Penalty For Organizing Or Actively Promoting A Street Takeover.
description: To enhance penalties for individuals who organize or actively promote street takeovers.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Concerning Victim Compensation In The Case Of Crimes Committed By Undocumented Immigrants.
description: To establish a victim compensation fund for victims of crimes committed by undocumented immigrants.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Restricting Residency Of Registered Sex Offenders Near Schools And Day Care Facilities.
description: To prohibit registered sex offenders from residing near schools or day care facilities.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Concerning Communication Between Law Enforcement Officers And Federal Immigration Authorities.
description: To enhance public safety and security and foster greater communication between law enforcement officers and federal immigration authorities regarding undocumented immigrants convicted of felonies and violent crimes.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Permitting Law Enforcement To Stop A Motor Vehicle Due To The Odor Of Cannabis.
description: To prevent death and injury due to impaired drivers.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Concerning Overcharging By Correctional Facility Commissaries.
description: To prohibit overcharging of incarcerated persons and their families by commissaries.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Concerning Reform Of Laws Related To Cannabis And Equity.
description: To end the enforcement of nonviolent cannabis offenses, facilitate the release of individuals affected by outdated laws, create equity opportunities for communities impacted by cannabis prohibition and provide comprehensive education and training for law enforcement on cannabis-related matters.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Concerning Sexual Misconduct.
description: To ensure that complaints concerning incidences of sexual misconduct do not go unrecorded and parties are held liable.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Concerning Halfway Houses.
description: To allow formerly incarcerated persons to save funds to assist in their reentry into society.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Decriminalizing The Possession Of Psilocybin.
description: To decriminalize the possession of psilocybin.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Repealing The Trust Act.
description: To repeal the Trust Act.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Concerning The Statute Of Limitations For Crimes Committed Against The Elderly.
description: To extend the statute of limitations for the prosecution of crimes committed against the elderly.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Creating A Tiered System For The Connecticut Sex Offender Registry.
description: To create a tiered system for the sex offender registry.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Concerning Squatting.
description: To criminalize illegal squatting on private property.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Raising The Minimum Age For Arrest.
description: To raise the minimum age of arrest from ten to fourteen years of age.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Creating A Job Training Reentry Program And A State-wide Reentry Program.
description: To develop a program to ensure the appropriate supports are in place for those returning to the community after incarceration.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Increasing Penalties For Swatting.
description: To increase swatting penalties.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Enhancing Interventional Service In The Case Of Repeat Juvenile Offenders.
description: To ensure accountability and early intervention in cases of repeat juvenile offenders.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Concerning Probable Cause For Driving Under The Influence If A Passenger Is Observed Using Cannabis.
description: To allow police to establish probable cause for driving under the influence if a passenger of a motor vehicle is observed using cannabis.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Concerning Earned Risk Reduction Credits In The Case Of Serious Violent Offenses.
description: To preclude the most serious offenders from earning risk reduction credits.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Repealing The Trust Act.
description: To repeal the Trust Act.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Concerning The Standards Of Review Used By The Psychiatric Security Review Board.
description: To reform the standards of review used by the Psychiatric Security Review Board for managing the confinement and release of persons found not-guilty by reason of insanity.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Reducing Fees For Small Business Filings With The Secretary Of The State.
description: To reduce fees for small business filings with the Secretary of the State.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Concerning Financial Assistance For Postsecondary Education Expenses For Individuals Adopted Through The Department Of Children And Families' Foster Care Program.
description: To extend the eligibility to receive financial assistance for postsecondary education expenses from the Department of Children and Families for adoptees whose postsecondary education plans were interrupted by the COVID-19 pandemic.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Children
