description: To (1) separate the Public Utilities Regulatory Authority from the Department of Energy and Environmental Protection, (2) require prompt appointments to fill any vacancy on the authority, (3) impose term limits on members of the authority, (4) require legislative approval for certain actions of the authority, (5) require the authority to perform more frequent rate adjustment analyses, (6) require the authority to create a public dashboard concerning unpaid utility bills, and (7) require the authority to publish an easy to read fiscal analysis prior to the authority's final decision in any rate case.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Energy and Technology

title: An Act Concerning Protections For Consumer Access To Affordable Electricity.
description: To reduce energy costs and increase energy supply.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Energy and Technology

title: An Act Concerning The Information Required For Special Fuel Tax Returns.
description: To prohibit the Department of Revenue Services from requiring taxpayers to report nontaxable sales and use information when filing special fuel tax returns.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Finance, Revenue and Bonding

title: An Act Establishing A Caregiver Tax Credit Against The Personal Income Tax.
description: To establish a caregiver tax credit against the personal income tax.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Finance, Revenue and Bonding

title: An Act Eliminating The Earned Income Tax Credit.
description: To eliminate the earned income tax credit.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Finance, Revenue and Bonding

title: An Act Concerning The Use Of Small Town Economic Assistance Program Grants.
description: To allow municipalities to use STEAP grants for capital projects on nonmunicipal property.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Finance, Revenue and Bonding

title: An Act Establishing A Refundable Veterans' Caregiver Tax Credit Against The Personal Income Tax.
description: To establish a refundable veterans' caregiver tax credit.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Finance, Revenue and Bonding

title: An Act Concerning Independent Review Of The Investment Performance Of The State's Pension Funds.
description: To require an annual independent review of the investment performance of the state's pension funds.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Finance, Revenue and Bonding

title: An Act Withdrawing Connecticut From The National Popular Vote Interstate Compact.
description: To withdraw the state from the National Popular Vote Interstate Compact.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Government Administration and Elections

title: An Act Concerning The Titles Of Proposed Bills.
description: To ensure that bill titles reflect legislative intent.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Government Administration and Elections

description: To reduce state spending by eliminating the requirement that the State Bond Commission allocate one per cent of the state building project cost for the purchase of works of art and permitting the reuse of existing works of art.

description: To require photo identification for voting in person or by absentee ballot and to afford electors means of obtaining, free of charge, such photo identification or a photocopy thereof for purposes of so voting.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Government Administration and Elections

title: An Act Concerning Training Of Registrars Of Voters.
description: To require the Secretary of the State to provide certain elections-related training to registrars of voters.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Government Administration and Elections

title: An Act Concerning Early Voting At Elections And Primaries.
description: To specify fewer days for early voting at elections and primaries.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Government Administration and Elections

title: An Act Prohibiting The Unsolicited Provision Of Absentee Ballot Applications.
description: To prohibit the unsolicited provision of absentee ballot applications.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Government Administration and Elections

title: An Act Limiting Candidates To Appearing Only Once On The Election Ballot.
description: To require that, for any candidate who has been nominated by multiple parties, the name of such candidate shall appear only once on the ballot.

title: An Act Eliminating The Board Of Regents For Higher Education.
description: To eliminate the Board of Regents for Higher Education.
committee: Joint Higher Education and Employment Advancement
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Higher Education and Employment Advancement

title: An Act Prohibiting The Use Of State Funds By Public Institutions Of Higher Education For Speaking Fees.
description: To prohibit the use of state funds by public institutions of higher education for politically related speaking fees or events costs.
committee: Joint Higher Education and Employment Advancement
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Higher Education and Employment Advancement

description: To better protect senior Medicaid recipients by extending Medicaid coverage for medical alert systems.

title: An Act Concerning The Removal Of An Unauthorized Individual From Real Property.
description: To allow law enforcement to remove an individual from real property if such individual does not possess a signed written agreement authorizing the individual's occupancy.

title: An Act Requiring A Fair Rent Commission Dismiss Certain Cases.
description: To require a fair rent commission to dismiss any case when the rent increase for a dwelling unit is within the fair market rental value for comparable dwelling units in the neighborhood where the property is located.

title: An Act Providing For Optional Payment Of The Healthy Homes Fund Surcharge.
description: To eliminate the requirement that insureds under certain homeowners insurance policies pay, and provide for optional payment of, the surcharge imposed pursuant to section 38a-331 of the general statutes.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Insurance and Real Estate

title: An Act Eliminating The Healthy Homes Fund Surcharge.
description: To eliminate the requirement that insureds under certain homeowners insurance policies pay the surcharge imposed pursuant to section 38a-331 of the general statutes.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Insurance and Real Estate

title: An Act Concerning Assessments And User Fees Charged To Health Carriers By The Connecticut Health Insurance Exchange.
description: To require the exchange, established pursuant to section 38a-1081 of the general statutes, to gain legislative approval before: (1) Modifying any existing assessment or user fee charged to health carriers; or (2) charging any new assessment or user fee to health carriers.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Insurance and Real Estate

title: An Act Concerning Liability For Injuries Occurring In A Skateboard Park Or Dog Park Maintained By A Municipality.
description: To reduce a municipality's exposure to liability for injuries occurring in a municipally maintained skateboard park or dog park.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Restoring Capital Punishment.
description: To restore the death penalty in Connecticut.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Concerning The Request For Proof Of Age To Purchase Tobacco.
description: To reduce the burden on retailers by removing the requirement that an individual be required to produce proof of age each time the individual purchases tobacco if the retailer has previously reviewed such individual's identification and knows that the individual is twenty-one years of age or older.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Ensuring That Local And State Government Officials Fully Cooperate With Law Enforcement Personnel In The Enforcement Of Federal Immigration Law.
description: To ensure that local and state officials are fully cooperating with law enforcement personnel in the enforcement of federal immigration law.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Concerning The Applicability Of Governmental Immunity In Actions Filed Against A Police Officer Or Law Enforcement Unit.
description: To allow police officers to assert governmental immunity in more situations and to permit interlocutory appeals of a trial court's denial of the application of the defense of governmental immunity.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Concerning The Definition Of Child Pornography.
description: To bring the child pornography definitions in line with federal language concerning virtual children.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Concerning Unlawful Dissemination Of Intimate Images That Are Digitally Altered Or Created Through The Use Of Artificial Intelligence.
description: To criminalize unauthorized dissemination of intimate images that are digitally altered or created through the use of artificial intelligence.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Concerning Consent Searches.
description: To permit law enforcement officials to conduct a consent search of a motor vehicle.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Concerning Legal Protections For Children In The Event Of Intimate Partner Homicide.
description: To provide enhanced legal protections for children in the event of intimate partner violence.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Concerning The Possession Of Nitrous Oxide.
description: To protect the public from the harmful effects of nitrous oxide.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Restricting Early Release For Persons Convicted Of Crimes Involving Sexual Assault Or Firearms.
description: To protect the citizens of Connecticut from early release of convicted violent felons.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Concerning Consent Searches Of Motor Vehicles.
description: To permit consent searches of motor vehicles in the same manner as permitted for pedestrians.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Eliminating Prohibitions On Noncompete Agreements.
description: To eliminate existing prohibitions on noncompete provisions in private employment contracts.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Labor and Public Employees

title: An Act Concerning School Bus Drivers And The Ability To Strike.
description: To prohibit the ability of school bus drivers to strike.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Labor and Public Employees

title: An Act Concerning Documentation For The Use Of Paid Sick Leave.
description: To allow employers to require documentation that an employee's use of paid sick leave is being taken for a permitted purpose.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Labor and Public Employees

title: An Act Concerning The Prevailing Wage Threshold For Renovations.
description: To increase the total cost threshold for renovations of any public works project and to require such threshold to be indexed to reflect inflation.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Labor and Public Employees

title: An Act Increasing The Prevailing Wage Threshold.
description: To increase the prevailing wage thresholds.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Labor and Public Employees

title: An Act Concerning The Employment Of Minors At Least Sixteen Years Of Age In Certain Occupations.
description: To expand the scope of work that minors sixteen and seventeen years of age can be employed or permitted to work in.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Labor and Public Employees

title: An Act Concerning Time Frames For Binding Arbitration.
description: To amend time frames for binding arbitration in the state.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Labor and Public Employees

title: An Act Concerning The Adequate Prescription Of Pain Medication For Cancer Patients, Palliative And Nursing Home Patients And Patients Experiencing Chronic Intractable Pain.
description: To allow health care practitioners to adequately prescribe pain medication.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Public Health

title: An Act Allowing Municipalities To Select Their Primary Service Area Responder.
description: To allow each municipality to select its own primary service area responder.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Public Health

title: An Act Codifying Certain Provisions Of The Emergency Medical Treatment And Active Labor Act.
description: To codify certain provisions of the federal Emergency Medical Treatment and Active Labor Act concerning emergency health care.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Public Health

title: An Act Requiring Parental Notification Prior To The Termination Of A Pregnancy By A Minor.
description: To ensure that the best interests of a minor are protected when facing an unplanned pregnancy.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Public Health

title: An Act Exempting The Plans For Single-family Dwellings From Disclosure Under The Freedom Of Information Act.
description: To protect the security of single-family dwellings by exempting the plans for such dwellings from disclosure under the Freedom of Information Act.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Public Safety and Security

title: An Act Requiring A Study Of Police Policies On Wellness Checks.
description: To review policies of the State Police and municipal police departments on wellness checks.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Public Safety and Security

title: An Act Concerning A Study Of The State's Current Laws Regarding Repeat Offenders Of Laws Prohibiting Driving Under The Influence.
description: To study the state's current laws regarding repeat offenders of laws prohibiting driving under the influence in order to protect the public from impaired drivers.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Public Safety and Security

title: An Act Establishing A Certain Minimum Number Of State Troopers.
description: To establish a minimum number of one thousand two hundred forty-eight state troopers.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Public Safety and Security

title: An Act Concerning A Study Of The State Fire Safety Code Relating To Methods Of Egress In The Event Of An Intruder.
description: To study the State Fire Safety Code as it relates to methods of egress in the event of an intruder, including the use of a lock that requires two releasing motions.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Public Safety and Security

title: An Act Allowing Law Enforcement Officers To Carry And To Authorize The Use Of Pulse Oximeters.
description: To allow law enforcement officers to carry and to authorize the use of pulse oximeters.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Public Safety and Security

title: An Act Requiring The Commissioner Of Emergency Services And Public Protection To Acquire A Federal Firearms License.
description: To ensure the Commissioner of Emergency Services and Public Protection facilitates firearm transfers from person to person in compliance with rules established by the federal Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco and Firearms regarding such transfers.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Public Safety and Security

title: An Act Establishing A Working Group To Study And Determine The Best Mechanism For Providing Notice Of Certain Restraining Or Protective Orders To School Officials And Resource Officers.
description: To establish a working group to study and determine the best mechanism for providing the appropriate school official or school resource officer with notice of any restraining or protective order concerning a student or the parent or legal guardian of a student at such official's or officer's school.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Public Safety and Security

title: An Act Concerning Texting While Driving.
description: To increase the fines and penalties for someone who causes injury to another person as a result of texting and driving.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Transportation

title: An Act Concerning Transparency In Transportation Projects.
description: To provide transparency in transportation projects.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Transportation

title: An Act Concerning Certain Federal Veterans' Benefits And Income Eligibility Determinations For Certain Public Assistance Programs.
description: To disregard from income certain federal veterans' benefits when determining eligibility for certain public assistance programs.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Veterans' and Military Affairs

title: An Act Eliminating Service In Time Of War As An Eligibility Criterion For Certain State And Municipal Veterans' Benefits.
description: To eliminate service in time of war as an eligibility criterion for certain state and municipal veterans' benefits.
last_action: Immediate Transmittal

title: An Act Concerning Funding For Certain Community Service Organizations.
description: To provide additional funding for United Services, Inc. and youth services in the towns of Chaplin, Hampton and Scotland.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Appropriations

title: An Act Concerning Funding For Law Enforcement Crisis Intervention Teams.
description: To permanently fund law enforcement crisis intervention teams.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Appropriations

title: An Act Concerning Funding For The Office Of Dyslexia And Reading Disabilities.
description: To provide an operating budget for the Office of Dyslexia and Reading Disabilities.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Appropriations

title: An Act Concerning A Study Of A Pension Buyout Plan For State Employees.
description: To require the Office of Policy Management to study a state employee pension buyout plan.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Appropriations

title: An Act Concerning Funding To Reimburse Municipalities For Revenue Loss Caused By Veteran Property Tax Exemptions.
description: To hold municipalities harmless for granting veterans benefits.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Appropriations

title: An Act Establishing A Task Force To Review Policies Concerning The Release Of Balloons.
description: To create a task force to review policies concerning the release of balloons.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Environment

title: An Act Requiring An Audit Of Unpaid Utility Bills Due To Financial Hardship.
description: To require (1) an audit of shut-off moratoria related to the financial hardship of an end use customer of any utility, and (2) monthly statements from the Public Utilities Regulatory Authority concerning efforts to collect unpaid bills related to such moratoria.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Energy and Technology

title: An Act Concerning A Suspension Of The Public Benefits Charge, Limits On Certain Power Purchase Agreements, The Elimination Of Certain Zero-carbon Incentives And An Increase In The Natural Gas Supply.
description: To (1) suspend the charges collectively called the "Combined Public Benefits Charge" pending legislative review of such charges, (2) prohibit any power purchase agreement that provides for the purchase of electricity at a price exceeding one hundred fifty per cent of the wholesale price of electricity, (3) remove incentives for the development of zero-carbon energy sources unless such incentives are available for the development of any energy generation, and (4) promote an increase in the natural gas supply in the state.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Energy and Technology

title: An Act Establishing A Capital Gains Tax On Certain Endowment Funds Of Institutions Of Higher Education And Concerning The Use Of The Revenue Generated.
description: To impose a capital gains tax on certain endowment funds of institutions of higher education and dedicate the revenue from such tax to reducing the amount that participants in the Paid Family and Medical Leave Insurance Program are required to contribute under section 31-49g of the general statutes.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Finance, Revenue and Bonding

title: An Act Increasing The Agricultural Labor Remuneration Threshold For Imposition Of Unemployment Taxes.
description: To increase, for purposes of the imposition of unemployment taxes, the threshold for payments made to individuals employed in agricultural labor in a calendar quarter, from twenty thousand dollars to thirty thousand dollars.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Finance, Revenue and Bonding

title: An Act Concerning Tour Providers And The Provision Of Basic Life Support.
description: To ensure that certain persons providing tours are trained to provide basic life support.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on General Law

title: An Act Concerning Skilled Trade Licensing Reciprocity, Licensing Fees And Apprenticeship Ratios.
description: To provide for licensing reciprocity for skilled tradespersons, cap licensing fees applicable to skilled tradespersons and modify the required apprenticeship ratios applicable to the skilled trades.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on General Law

title: An Act Prohibiting Illegal Immigrants From Receiving Taxpayer-funded Benefits.
description: To reduce the tax burden of lawful residents by prohibiting the state from providing taxpayer-funded benefits and social welfare services to illegal immigrants.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Human Services

title: An Act Concerning Medicaid And Medicare Rate Reimbursement Parity.
description: To equalize Medicaid and Medicare reimbursement rates.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Human Services

title: An Act Requiring Health Insurance Coverage For Biomarker Testing.
description: To require that individual and group health insurance policies provide coverage for biomarker testing.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Insurance and Real Estate

title: An Act Prohibiting Health Insurance Companies From Unilaterally Limiting Health Insurance Coverage For Special Needs Children.
description: To prohibit health insurance companies from unilaterally limiting health insurance coverage for special needs children, including health insurance coverage for physical therapy, occupational therapy, speech pathology and feeding therapy services.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Insurance and Real Estate

title: An Act Concerning The Creation Of A Task Force To Study Reforms To The Family Court Process.
description: To create a task force to study and recommend reforms to the family court process in order to ensure justice and fair outcomes and to reduce the costs to individuals.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Concerning Compensation Paid To Jurors.
description: To provide increased compensation to jurors who are required to miss more than five days of work due to jury service.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Clarifying The Applicability Of The Prevailing Wage Statute.
description: To maximize private investment in municipal economic development and affordable housing projects.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Labor and Public Employees

title: An Act Concerning The Administration Of The Written Examination For Building Inspector Licensure.
description: To specify that the Department of Administrative Services shall administer the written examination for building inspectors every other month.
last_action: Change of Reference, House to Committee on Government Administration and Elections

title: An Act Repealing A Statute Concerning Prohibited Charter Amendments.
description: To repeal a statute concerning prohibited charter amendments.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Planning and Development

title: An Act Concerning Municipal Assistance In Complying With Requirements Related To Stormwater Discharge.
description: To aid municipalities in compliance with permitting requirements related to the discharge of stormwater from municipal separate storm sewer systems.
last_action: Change of Reference, House to Committee on Environment

title: An Act Concerning The Regional Planning Incentive Account Distribution Formula.
description: To change the regional planning incentive account distribution formula by indexing the per capita payment amount to inflation or an amount determined by the General Assembly, provided such amount shall not be decreased.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Planning and Development

title: An Act Requiring A Study Regarding The Definition Of "intellectual Disability".
description: To explore methods of determining intellectual disability other than the intelligence quotient.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Public Health

title: An Act Requiring An Increased Number Of State Troopers Assigned As School Resource Officers At Vocational-technical Schools.
description: To require that an increased number of state troopers be assigned as school resource officers at vocational-technical schools.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Public Safety and Security

title: An Act Concerning Police Officer Discretion To Pursue Motor Vehicles.
description: To provide discretion to a police officer to pursue a motor vehicle if such officer can articulate a public safety need for such pursuit.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Public Safety and Security

title: An Act Requiring A Study Of The Barriers To Medical Professionals Becoming Volunteer Firefighters Or Volunteer Emergency Medical Technicians.
description: To address the shortage of volunteer firefighters and volunteer emergency medical technicians.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Public Safety and Security

title: An Act Lowering The Cost Of Resident State Troopers For Municipalities.
description: To lower the cost of resident state troopers for municipalities.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Public Safety and Security

title: An Act Establishing A Minimum Number Of Sworn State Police Personnel.
description: To protect public safety by ensuring appropriate staffing levels within the state police force.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Public Safety and Security

title: An Act Establishing A New Pilot Program To Test On-demand Microtransit Services In The Counties Of Windham And Tolland.
description: To establish and fund a new pilot program to test on-demand microtransit services in rural areas not currently served by public transportation.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Transportation

title: An Act Prohibiting Anti-israeli Boycott, Divestment And Sanctions.
description: To ban anti-Israeli BDS (Boycott, Divestment and Sanctions) in state and local pensions, state contracts and publicly funded post-secondary education.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Appropriations

title: An Act Concerning Funding For Affordable And Supportive Housing.
description: To invest in affordable and supportive housing.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Appropriations

title: An Act Concerning Investment In Supportive Housing And Home Ownership Initiatives.
description: To promote investments in supportive housing initiatives and home ownership support initiatives.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Appropriations

title: An Act Concerning Funding For Sign Language Interpreter Services At Alcoholics Anonymous And Narcotics Anonymous Meetings.
description: To promote inclusivity and equal access to addiction recovery services in alignment with the state's commitment to support public health and enhance accessibility for individuals with disabilities.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Appropriations

title: An Act Establishing At The University Of Connecticut A Center Of Excellence For Neuromodulation Treatments For Veterans.
description: To establish at The University of Connecticut a Center of Excellence for Neuromodulation Treatments for Veterans.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Appropriations

title: An Act Concerning Funding For Restoration Of The Historic Pinney House In The Town Of Ellington.
description: To provide funding for essential restoration and conservation work on, and the development of educational exhibits at, the historic Pinney House in the town of Ellington.
last_action: Change of Reference, House to Committee on Finance, Revenue and Bonding

title: An Act Establishing A Public Health Urgent Communication Fund.
description: To provide funding for clear and rapid dissemination of urgent health information to the members of the general public, health care providers and other stakeholders.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Appropriations

title: An Act Establishing An Emergency Public Health Financial Safeguard Fund.
description: To establish a fund to act as a financial safety net to address unexpected shortfalls in public health funding and ensure the Department of Public Health's ability to respond to the health care needs of state residents and provide a continuity of essential public health services.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Appropriations

title: An Act Concerning Funding For The Elderly Nutrition Program.
description: To provide funding to ensure the continuation and expansion of the elderly nutrition program and provide nutritious meals, social engagement and community support to senior citizens.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Appropriations

title: An Act Concerning The Learn Here, Live Here Program.
description: To increase the annual expenditure on the Learn Here, Live Here program to not more than five million dollars and to make such program available only to individuals whose income is seventy-five thousand dollars or less.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Commerce

title: An Act Concerning Permit Requirements For Cloud Seeding Activities In The State.
description: To protect public safety, health and the environment from any unreasonably risky weather modification activities.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Environment

title: An Act Establishing A Task Force To Assess And Implement Infrastructure Resiliency To Climate Change In The Greater Hartford Area Surrounding The Connecticut River.
description: To address infrastructure issues in the Greater Hartford area surrounding the Connecticut River to account for climate change resiliency.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Environment

title: An Act Concerning The Use Of Federal Funding To Pay Certain Systems Benefits Charges.
description: To allocate funding received by the state under the American Rescue Plan Act for the purpose of paying systems benefits charges accrued by electric distribution companies in connection with hardship protection measures during the COVID-19 pandemic.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Energy and Technology

title: An Act Concerning Moratoria And Noise Audits For Commercial Solar Photovoltaic Facilities.
description: To (1) allow municipalities with three or more existing commercial solar photovoltaic facilities located within such municipality to impose a moratorium on the construction or installation of such facilities within such municipality, (2) allow municipalities to conduct noise audits and impose penalties for noise violations at commercial solar photovoltaic facilities, and (3) require that any developer, owner or manager of a commercial solar photovoltaic facility provide a community point of contact concerning the operation of such facility.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Energy and Technology

title: An Act Concerning The Composition Of The Public Utilities Regulatory Authority.
description: To (1) require that the Public Utility Regulatory Authority be composed of not fewer than five members, one of whom has personal experience with a disability and one of whom with an annual income less than the state median income, and (2) to prohibit current or former employees of, or current or former lobbyists for, any public utility company in the state from serving on the Public Utilities Regulatory Authority.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Energy and Technology

title: An Act Concerning Technical Support For Municipal Electric Utilities And Establishing The Municipal Electric Utility Investment Fund.
description: To (1) create an office within the Department of Energy and Environmental Protection to provide technical and operational support for any municipality that has established or seeks to establish a municipal electric utility, and (2) establish the Municipal Utility Investment Fund to provide grants or low-interest loans to municipalities that seek to acquire, build, expand or improve municipal electric utility infrastructure.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Energy and Technology

title: An Act Concerning A Prohibition On Publicly Traded Utility Companies.
description: To prohibit the stock of any public utility company from being traded on a stock exchange.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Energy and Technology

title: An Act Concerning The Review Of Power Purchase Agreements With Nuclear Power Generating Facilities.
description: To amend the general statutes to allow the Commissioner of Energy and Environmental Protection to (1) review the terms of any power purchase agreement entered into or approved by the commissioner and a nuclear power generating facility on or before July 1, 2024, (2) require the disclosure of any contracts or other financial arrangements entered into by a nuclear power generating facility incidental to such power purchase agreement, and (3) withdraw from, or withdraw approval for, any such agreement if the commissioner determines that a disproportionate amount of funds paid to a nuclear power generating facility pursuant to such agreement are being used for capital projects or other expenses outside the state or if such withdrawal is in the best interest of residents of the state.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Energy and Technology

title: An Act Concerning Accountability For Hospital Tax Delinquents.
description: To safeguard state tax revenues, promote fiscal responsibility and uphold the equitable distribution of Medicaid funds for public benefit.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Finance, Revenue and Bonding

title: An Act Increasing The Qualifying Income Thresholds For Certain Personal Income Tax Deductions.
description: To increase the qualifying income thresholds for the personal income tax deductions for Social Security benefits, pension and annuity income and distributions from individual retirement accounts.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Finance, Revenue and Bonding

title: An Act Concerning The Tax Rates Of Tobacco And Nicotine Products.
description: To align the tax rates of combustible and noncombustible tobacco and nicotine products to promote uniformity in the tax treatment of such products.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Finance, Revenue and Bonding

title: An Act Restoring The Rate Of The Credit Against The Affected Business Entity Tax.
description: To restore the rate of the credit against the affected business entity tax to ninety-three and one-hundredths per cent.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Finance, Revenue and Bonding

title: An Act Establishing A Tax On Certain Political Committees And Candidate Committees.
description: To establish a tax on political committees and candidate committees that raise and spend funds in the state and to dedicate the revenue generated from such tax to the support of the Citizens' Election Program and other elections-related endeavors.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Government Administration and Elections

title: An Act Prohibiting Certain Conduct Concerning Drugs And Medical Devices Used To Execute The Death Penalty.
description: To provide that certain persons who are licensed, registered or doing business in this state shall not manufacture, compound, sell, test, distribute, dispense or supply any drug or medical device for the purpose of executing the death penalty.
last_action: Public Hearing 02/10

title: An Act Requiring Alcoholic Liquor Containers To Display Cancer Risk Warning Labels.
description: To require alcoholic liquor containers to bear cancer warning labels.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on General Law

title: An Act Concerning Representations Made By Food Service Establishments Regarding The Freshness Of Food Items And Food Ingredients.
description: To require restaurants and other food service establishments to accurately represent whether food items and food ingredients are "fresh".
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on General Law

title: An Act Concerning The Certification And Regulation Of Medical Device Representatives.
description: To provide for the certification and regulation of medical device representatives.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on General Law

title: An Act Concerning Compounding Pharmacies.
description: To ensure that compounding pharmacies are able to compound active pharmaceutical ingredients for the purpose of ensuring access to certain drugs.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on General Law

title: An Act Authorizing The State To Import The Active Ingredients Of Certain Drugs.
description: To authorize the state to import the active ingredients of certain drugs to ensure access to such drugs.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on General Law

title: An Act Concerning Cost Transparency In Legend Drug Advertisements.
description: To promote transparency in legend drug costs, informed consumer decision-making and pharmaceutical manufacturer accountability.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on General Law

title: An Act Prohibiting The Sale Of Food Products Containing Certain Food Additives.
description: To prohibit the sale of food products containing certain food additives, including, but not limited to, red dye number three.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on General Law

title: An Act Establishing A State-wide Program For The Safe Disposal Of Sharps In Conjunction With Prescription Drug Take Back Days.
description: To ensure that state residents have a safe and convenient way to dispose of sharps, thereby preventing potential harm to sanitation workers, the public and the environment and to support the broader public health and environmental safety efforts by addressing the growing need for safe sharps management in conjunction with existing prescription drug disposal programs.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on General Law

title: An Act Requiring Medicaid Coverage For Bone Marrow And Stem Cell Transplants And Fda-approved Gene Therapies To Treat Sickle Cell Disease.
description: To provide equitable access to life-changing medical advancements to treat sickle cell disease, ameliorate suffering and reduce long-term health care costs.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Human Services

title: An Act Requiring Medicaid Reimbursement Rates Not To Fall Below Ninety Per Cent Of Medicare Reimbursement Rates.
description: To increase provider participation in the state Medicaid program and expand access to and quality of health care for Medicaid recipients.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Human Services

title: An Act Requiring The Establishment Of A Fair Rent Commission In Any Town, City Or Borough With A Population Of At Least Ten Thousand.
description: To require that a municipality with a population of ten thousand or more establish a fair rent commission.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Housing

title: An Act Concerning Access To Homeownership And Regulation Of Corporate Ownership Of Residential Property.
description: To increase access to affordable homeownership and regulate corporate ownership of residential properties.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Housing

title: An Act Establishing A Right To Housing And A Right To Housing Committee.
description: To establish a right to housing policy and a right to housing committee.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Housing

title: An Act Appropriating Funds For Temporary Housing For Homeless Persons.
description: To authorize and provide funding for the Department of Housing to enter into lease agreements to provide temporary housing for homeless persons.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Housing

title: An Act Concerning Patient Choice And Continuity Of Care During Health Insurance Contract Disputes.
description: To allow any covered person under a health insurance policy that is the subject of a health care contract dispute between such covered person's health care provider and the health insurer, resulting in such health care provider being deemed out-of-network, to terminate such policy and enroll in a new health insurance policy that provides in-network coverage, without any early termination fees, financial penalties, increased premiums, increased out-of-pocket expenses, changes in coverage or coverage gaps.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Insurance and Real Estate

title: An Act Concerning Pharmacy Benefits Manager Reform.
description: To reform pharmacy benefits manager practices in this state and establish a duty of care for pharmacy benefits managers.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Insurance and Real Estate

title: An Act Prohibiting Health Carriers From Using Artificial Intelligence In The Evaluation And Determination Of Patient Care.
description: To prohibit health carriers from using artificial intelligence in the evaluation and determination of patient care to safeguard patient access to testing, medications and procedures.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Insurance and Real Estate

title: An Act Concerning Health Insurance Coverage For Municipal Employees Under The State Employee Health Plan.
description: To (1) allow any municipal employee, including, but not limited to, teachers, to participate in the state employee health plan, while maintaining the decision-making power of local collective bargaining units; and (2) require that the state provide to municipal employers transparent communication regarding costs to municipal employees who choose to participate in the state employee health plan.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Insurance and Real Estate

title: An Act Requiring Public Accountability Hearings For Insurance Companies Operating Under The Employee Retirement Income Security Act In Connecticut.
description: To promote transparency and accountability by insurance companies operating under ERISA in the state.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Insurance and Real Estate

title: An Act Defining Breast Ultrasound As A Screening Procedure For Insureds.
description: To define breast ultrasound as a screening procedure for insureds.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Insurance and Real Estate

title: An Act Authorizing A Fee On Health Insurers That Issue Medicare Advantage Plans In The State.
description: To authorize the state to impose a fee on health insurers that issue Medicare Advantage plans in the state to recoup certain health care costs for services provided to Medicaid-Medicare beneficiaries in the state.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Insurance and Real Estate

title: An Act Concerning Consumer Protections For Long-term Care Insurance Policyholders.
description: To: (1) Establish a four-year moratorium on long-term care insurance premium rate increases; (2) require that the Insurance Department hold a public hearing for long-term care premium rate increase requests that exceed five per cent; (3) establish a personal income tax deduction for individual long-term care insurance policyholders for whom the premium rate for such policy increased by more than five per cent in a taxable year; and (4) establish a task force to (A) study the long-term care insurance industry, including, but not limited to, premium costs and alternative policy structures, including state-funded insurance pools for long-term care policyholders, and (B) provide recommendations to improve long-term care insurance affordability and coverage.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Insurance and Real Estate

title: An Act Requiring That Health Carriers Assume Responsibility For The Collection Of Out-of-pocket Expenses For Covered Benefits.
description: To require that health carriers (1) collect any coinsurance, copayment, deductible or other out-of-pocket expense due and owing for a covered benefit that the health care provider provided to the insured, and (2) pay, after a certain period of time, such unpaid out-of-pocket expense due and owing for such covered benefit.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Insurance and Real Estate

title: An Act Requiring Health Insurers To Allow A Covered Person To Terminate Coverage And Procure Alternate Health Insurance Without Penalty When Such Covered Person's Health Care Providers Are Designated Out-of-network.
description: To promote patient choice and continuity of care in the event of health insurance coverage disputes.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Insurance and Real Estate

title: An Act Establishing A Cat Redemption Pilot Program Within The Department Of Correction.
description: To establish a cat redemption pilot program within the Department of Correction for the well-being of persons who are incarcerated and to provide a solution to the problem of abandoned and stray cats.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Concerning Health Insurer Liability For Damages And Harms Caused By Undue Delay In Authorizing Or Approving Care.
description: To ensure that a health insurer is held accountable for the insurer's role in restricting timely patient access to necessary health care treatment, while shielding a licensed medical professional from undue legal risks associated with the delay.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary

title: An Act Requiring The Department Of Correction To Provide A Person Who Is Incarcerated With A Form Authorizing Another Person Access To The Medical Records Of The Person Who Is Incarcerated.
description: To require the Department of Correction to provide a person who is incarcerated with a form authorizing another person to access the medical records of the person who is incarcerated.
last_action: Referred to Joint Committee on Judiciary
